   19: %%
   20: -module(gen_server_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   23: -include_lib("kernel/include/inet.hrl").
   24: 
   25: -export([init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2]).
   26: 
   27: -export([all/0, suite/0,groups/0,init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1, 
   28: 	 init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2]).
   29: -export([start/1, crash/1, call/1, send_request/1,
   30:          send_request_receive_reqid_collection/1,
   31:          send_request_wait_reqid_collection/1,
   32:          send_request_check_reqid_collection/1,
   33:          cast/1, cast_fast/1,
   34: 	 continue/1, info/1, abcast/1, multicall/1, multicall_down/1,
   35: 	 call_remote1/1, call_remote2/1, call_remote3/1, calling_self/1,
   36: 	 call_remote_n1/1, call_remote_n2/1, call_remote_n3/1, spec_init/1,
   37: 	 spec_init_local_registered_parent/1, 
   38: 	 spec_init_global_registered_parent/1,
   39: 	 otp_5854/1, hibernate/1, auto_hibernate/1, otp_7669/1, call_format_status/1,
   40: 	 error_format_status/1, terminate_crash_format/1, crash_in_format_status/1,
   41:          throw_in_format_status/1, format_all_status/1,
   42: 	 get_state/1, replace_state/1, call_with_huge_message_queue/1,
   43: 	 undef_handle_call/1, undef_handle_cast/1, undef_handle_info/1,
   44: 	 undef_init/1, undef_code_change/1, undef_terminate1/1,
   45: 	 undef_terminate2/1, undef_in_terminate/1, undef_in_handle_info/1,
   46: 	 undef_handle_continue/1,
   47: 
   48:          format_log_1/1, format_log_2/1,
   49:          reply_by_alias_with_payload/1
   50: 	]).
   51: 
   52: -export([stop1/1, stop2/1, stop3/1, stop4/1, stop5/1, stop6/1, stop7/1,
   53: 	 stop8/1, stop9/1, stop10/1]).
   54: 
   55: %% spawn export
   56: -export([spec_init_local/2, spec_init_global/2, spec_init_via/2,
   57: 	 spec_init_default_timeout/2, spec_init_global_default_timeout/2,
   58:          spec_init_anonymous/1,
   59: 	 spec_init_anonymous_default_timeout/1,
   60: 	 spec_init_not_proc_lib/1, cast_fast_messup/0]).
   61: 
   62: 
   63: %% The gen_server behaviour
   64: -export([init/1, handle_call/3, handle_cast/2, handle_continue/2,
   65: 	 handle_info/2, code_change/3, terminate/2, format_status/2]).
   66: 
   67: suite() ->
   68:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   69:      {timetrap,{minutes,1}}].
   70: 
   71: all() -> 
   72:     [start, {group,stop}, crash, call, send_request,
   73:      send_request_receive_reqid_collection, send_request_wait_reqid_collection,
   74:      send_request_check_reqid_collection, cast, cast_fast, info, abcast,
   75:      continue, multicall, multicall_down, call_remote1, call_remote2, calling_self,
   76:      call_remote3, call_remote_n1, call_remote_n2,
   77:      call_remote_n3, spec_init,
   78:      spec_init_local_registered_parent,
   79:      spec_init_global_registered_parent, otp_5854, hibernate, auto_hibernate,
   80:      otp_7669,
   81:      {group, format_status},
   82:      get_state, replace_state,
   83:      call_with_huge_message_queue, {group, undef_callbacks},
   84:      undef_in_terminate, undef_in_handle_info,
   85:      format_log_1, format_log_2, reply_by_alias_with_payload].
   86: 
   87: groups() -> 
   88:     [{stop, [],
   89:       [stop1, stop2, stop3, stop4, stop5, stop6, stop7, stop8, stop9, stop10]},
   90:      {format_status, [],
   91:       [call_format_status, error_format_status, terminate_crash_format,
   92:        crash_in_format_status, throw_in_format_status, format_all_status]},
   93:      {undef_callbacks, [],
   94:       [undef_handle_call, undef_handle_cast, undef_handle_info, undef_handle_continue,
   95:        undef_init, undef_code_change, undef_terminate1, undef_terminate2]}].
   96: 
   97: 
   98: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   99:     DataDir = ?config(data_dir, Config),
  100:     Server = filename:join(DataDir, "format_status_server.erl"),
  101:     {ok, format_status_server} = compile:file(Server),
  102:     Config.
  103: 
  104: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
  105:     ok.
  106: 
  107: init_per_group(undef_callbacks, Config) ->
  108:     DataDir = ?config(data_dir, Config),
  109:     Server = filename:join(DataDir, "oc_server.erl"),
  110:     {ok, oc_server} = compile:file(Server),
  111:     Config;
  112: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  113:     Config.
  114: 
  115: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  116:     Config.
  117: 
  118: 
  119: init_per_testcase(Case, Config) when Case == call_remote1;
  120: 				     Case == call_remote2;
  121: 				     Case == call_remote3;
  122: 				     Case == call_remote_n1;
  123: 				     Case == call_remote_n2;
  124: 				     Case == call_remote_n3;
  125:                                      Case == send_request ->
  126:     {ok,Peer,Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
  127:     ok = global:sync(),
  128:     [{node,Node}, {peer, Peer} | Config];
  129: 
  130: init_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
  131:     Config.
  132: 
  133: end_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
  134:     case proplists:get_value(peer, Config) of
  135: 	undefined ->
  136: 	    ok;
  137: 	Peer ->
  138: 	    peer:stop(Peer)
  139:     end,
  140:     ok.
  141: 
  142: 
  143: %% --------------------------------------
  144: %% Start and stop a gen_server.
  145: %% --------------------------------------
  146: 
  147: start(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  148:     OldFl = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  149: 
  150:     %% anonymous
  151:     {ok, Pid0} = gen_server:start(gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  152:     ok = gen_server:call(Pid0, started_p),
  153:     ok = gen_server:call(Pid0, stop),
  154:     busy_wait_for_process(Pid0,600),
  155:     {'EXIT', {noproc,_}} = (catch gen_server:call(Pid0, started_p, 1)),
  156: 
  157:     %% anonymous with timeout
  158:     {ok, Pid00} = gen_server:start(gen_server_SUITE, [],
  159: 				   [{timeout,1000}]),
  160:     ok = gen_server:call(Pid00, started_p),
  161:     ok = gen_server:call(Pid00, stop),
  162:     {error, timeout} = gen_server:start(gen_server_SUITE, sleep,
  163: 					[{timeout,100}]),
  164: 
  165:     %% anonymous with ignore
  166:     ignore = gen_server:start(gen_server_SUITE, ignore, []),
  167: 
  168:     %% anonymous with stop
  169:     {error, stopped} = gen_server:start(gen_server_SUITE, stop, []),
  170: 
  171:     %% anonymous linked
  172:     {ok, Pid1} =
  173: 	gen_server:start_link(gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  174:     ok = gen_server:call(Pid1, started_p),
  175:     ok = gen_server:call(Pid1, stop),
  176:     receive
  177: 	{'EXIT', Pid1, stopped} ->
  178: 	    ok
  179:     after 5000 ->
  180: 	    ct:fail(not_stopped)
  181:     end,
  182: 
  183:     %% anonymous monitored
  184:     {ok, {Pid1b, Mon1b}} =
  185: 	gen_server:start_monitor(gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  186:     ok = gen_server:call(Pid1b, started_p),
  187:     ok = gen_server:call(Pid1b, stop),
  188:     receive
  189: 	{'DOWN', Mon1b, process, Pid1b, stopped} ->
  190: 	    ok
  191:     after 5000 ->
  192: 	    ct:fail(not_stopped)
  193:     end,
  194: 
  195:     %% local register
  196:     {ok, Pid2} =
  197: 	gen_server:start({local, my_test_name},
  198: 			 gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  199:     ok = gen_server:call(my_test_name, started_p),
  200:     {error, {already_started, Pid2}} =
  201: 	gen_server:start({local, my_test_name},
  202: 			 gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  203:     ok = gen_server:call(my_test_name, stop),
  204: 
  205:     busy_wait_for_process(Pid2,600),
  206: 
  207:     {'EXIT', {noproc,_}} = (catch gen_server:call(Pid2, started_p, 10)),
  208: 
  209:     %% local register linked
  210:     {ok, Pid3} =
  211: 	gen_server:start_link({local, my_test_name},
  212: 			      gen_server_SUITE, [], []), 
  213:     ok = gen_server:call(my_test_name, started_p),
  214:     {error, {already_started, Pid3}} =
  215: 	gen_server:start({local, my_test_name},
  216: 			 gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  217:     ok = gen_server:call(my_test_name, stop),
  218:     receive
  219: 	{'EXIT', Pid3, stopped} ->
  220: 	    ok
  221:     after 5000 ->
  222: 	    ct:fail(not_stopped)
  223:     end,
  224: 
  225:     %% local register monitored
  226:     {ok, {Pid3b, Mon3b}} =
  227: 	gen_server:start_monitor({local, my_test_name},
  228:                                  gen_server_SUITE, [], []), 
  229:     ok = gen_server:call(my_test_name, started_p),
  230:     {error, {already_started, Pid3b}} =
  231: 	gen_server:start_monitor({local, my_test_name},
  232:                                  gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  233:     ok = gen_server:call(my_test_name, stop),
  234:     receive
  235: 	{'DOWN', Mon3b, process, Pid3b, stopped} ->
  236: 	    ok
  237:     after 5000 ->
  238: 	    ct:fail(not_stopped)
  239:     end,
  240: 
  241:     %% global register
  242:     {ok, Pid4} =
  243: 	gen_server:start({global, my_test_name},
  244: 			 gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  245:     ok = gen_server:call({global, my_test_name}, started_p),
  246:     {error, {already_started, Pid4}} =
  247: 	gen_server:start({global, my_test_name},
  248: 			 gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  249:     ok = gen_server:call({global, my_test_name}, stop),
  250:     busy_wait_for_process(Pid4,600),
  251:     {'EXIT', {noproc,_}} = (catch gen_server:call(Pid4, started_p, 10)),
  252: 
  253:     %% global register linked
  254:     {ok, Pid5} =
  255: 	gen_server:start_link({global, my_test_name},
  256: 			      gen_server_SUITE, [], []), 
  257:     ok = gen_server:call({global, my_test_name}, started_p),
  258:     {error, {already_started, Pid5}} =
  259: 	gen_server:start({global, my_test_name},
  260: 			 gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  261:     ok = gen_server:call({global, my_test_name}, stop),
  262:     receive
  263: 	{'EXIT', Pid5, stopped} ->
  264: 	    ok
  265:     after 5000 ->
  266: 	    ct:fail(not_stopped)
  267:     end,
  268: 
  269:     %% global register monitored
  270:     {ok, {Pid5b, Mon5b}} =
  271: 	gen_server:start_monitor({global, my_test_name},
  272:                                  gen_server_SUITE, [], []), 
  273:     ok = gen_server:call({global, my_test_name}, started_p),
  274:     {error, {already_started, Pid5b}} =
  275: 	gen_server:start_monitor({global, my_test_name},
  276:                                  gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  277:     ok = gen_server:call({global, my_test_name}, stop),
  278:     receive
  279: 	{'DOWN', Mon5b, process, Pid5b, stopped} ->
  280: 	    ok
  281:     after 5000 ->
  282: 	    ct:fail(not_stopped)
  283:     end,
  284: 
  285:     %% via register
  286:     dummy_via:reset(),
  287:     {ok, Pid6} =
  288: 	gen_server:start({via, dummy_via, my_test_name},
  289: 			 gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  290:     ok = gen_server:call({via, dummy_via, my_test_name}, started_p),
  291:     {error, {already_started, Pid6}} =
  292: 	gen_server:start({via, dummy_via, my_test_name},
  293: 			 gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  294:     ok = gen_server:call({via, dummy_via, my_test_name}, stop),
  295:     busy_wait_for_process(Pid6,600),
  296:     {'EXIT', {noproc,_}} = (catch gen_server:call(Pid6, started_p, 10)),
  297: 
  298:     %% via register linked
  299:     dummy_via:reset(),
  300:     {ok, Pid7} =
  301: 	gen_server:start_link({via, dummy_via, my_test_name},
  302: 			      gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  303:     ok = gen_server:call({via, dummy_via, my_test_name}, started_p),
  304:     {error, {already_started, Pid7}} =
  305: 	gen_server:start({via, dummy_via, my_test_name},
  306: 			 gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  307:     ok = gen_server:call({via, dummy_via, my_test_name}, stop),
  308:     receive
  309: 	{'EXIT', Pid7, stopped} ->
  310: 	    ok
  311:     after 5000 ->
  312: 	    ct:fail(not_stopped)
  313:     end,
  314:     receive
  315: 	Msg -> ct:fail({unexpected,Msg})
  316:     after 1 -> ok
  317:     end,
  318: 
  319:     process_flag(trap_exit, OldFl),
  320:     ok.
  321: 
  322: %% Anonymous, reason 'normal'
  323: stop1(_Config) ->
  324:     {ok, Pid} = gen_server:start(?MODULE, [], []),
  325:     ok = gen_server:stop(Pid),
  326:     false = erlang:is_process_alive(Pid),
  327:     {'EXIT',noproc} = (catch gen_server:stop(Pid)),
  328:     ok.
  329: 
  330: %% Anonymous, other reason
  331: stop2(_Config) ->
  332:     {ok,Pid} = gen_server:start(?MODULE, [], []),
  333:     ok = gen_server:stop(Pid, other_reason, infinity),
  334:     false = erlang:is_process_alive(Pid),
  335:     ok.
  336: 
  337: %% Anonymous, invalid timeout
  338: stop3(_Config) ->
  339:     {ok,Pid} = gen_server:start(?MODULE, [], []),
  340:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch gen_server:stop(Pid, other_reason, invalid_timeout)),
  341:     true = erlang:is_process_alive(Pid),
  342:     ok = gen_server:stop(Pid),
  343:     false = erlang:is_process_alive(Pid),
  344:     ok.
  345: 
  346: %% Registered name
  347: stop4(_Config) ->
  348:     {ok,Pid} = gen_server:start({local,to_stop},?MODULE, [], []),
  349:     ok = gen_server:stop(to_stop),
  350:     false = erlang:is_process_alive(Pid),
  351:     {'EXIT',noproc} = (catch gen_server:stop(to_stop)),
  352:     ok.
  353: 
  354: %% Registered name and local node
  355: stop5(_Config) ->
  356:     {ok,Pid} = gen_server:start({local,to_stop},?MODULE, [], []),
  357:     ok = gen_server:stop({to_stop,node()}),
  358:     false = erlang:is_process_alive(Pid),
  359:     {'EXIT',noproc} = (catch gen_server:stop({to_stop,node()})),
  360:     ok.
  361: 
  362: %% Globally registered name
  363: stop6(_Config) ->
  364:     {ok, Pid} = gen_server:start({global, to_stop}, ?MODULE, [], []),
  365:     ok = gen_server:stop({global,to_stop}),
  366:     false = erlang:is_process_alive(Pid),
  367:     {'EXIT',noproc} = (catch gen_server:stop({global,to_stop})),
  368:     ok.
  369: 
  370: %% 'via' registered name
  371: stop7(_Config) ->
  372:     dummy_via:reset(),
  373:     {ok, Pid} = gen_server:start({via, dummy_via, to_stop},
  374: 				 ?MODULE, [], []),
  375:     ok = gen_server:stop({via, dummy_via, to_stop}),
  376:     false = erlang:is_process_alive(Pid),
  377:     {'EXIT',noproc} = (catch gen_server:stop({via, dummy_via, to_stop})),
  378:     ok.
  379: 
  380: %% Anonymous on remote node
  381: stop8(_Config) ->
  382:     {ok,Peer,Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
  383:     Dir = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
  384:     rpc:call(Node,code,add_path,[Dir]),
  385:     {ok, Pid} = rpc:call(Node,gen_server,start,[?MODULE,[],[]]),
  386:     ok = gen_server:stop(Pid),
  387:     false = rpc:call(Node,erlang,is_process_alive,[Pid]),
  388:     {'EXIT',noproc} = (catch gen_server:stop(Pid)),
  389:     peer:stop(Peer),
  390:     {'EXIT',{{nodedown,Node},_}} = (catch gen_server:stop(Pid)),
  391:     ok.
  392: 
  393: %% Registered name on remote node
  394: stop9(_Config) ->
  395:     {ok,Peer,Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
  396:     Dir = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
  397:     rpc:call(Node,code,add_path,[Dir]),
  398:     {ok, Pid} = rpc:call(Node,gen_server,start,[{local,to_stop},?MODULE,[],[]]),
  399:     ok = gen_server:stop({to_stop,Node}),
  400:     undefined = rpc:call(Node,erlang,whereis,[to_stop]),
  401:     false = rpc:call(Node,erlang,is_process_alive,[Pid]),
  402:     {'EXIT',noproc} = (catch gen_server:stop({to_stop,Node})),
  403:     peer:stop(Peer),
  404:     {'EXIT',{{nodedown,Node},_}} = (catch gen_server:stop({to_stop,Node})),
  405:     ok.
  406: 
  407: %% Globally registered name on remote node
  408: stop10(_Config) ->
  409:     {ok,Peer,Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
  410:     Dir = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
  411:     rpc:call(Node,code,add_path,[Dir]),
  412:     {ok, Pid} = rpc:call(Node,gen_server,start,[{global,to_stop},?MODULE,[],[]]),
  413:     ok = global:sync(),
  414:     ok = gen_server:stop({global,to_stop}),
  415:     false = rpc:call(Node,erlang,is_process_alive,[Pid]),
  416:     {'EXIT',noproc} = (catch gen_server:stop({global,to_stop})),
  417:     peer:stop(Peer),
  418:     {'EXIT',noproc} = (catch gen_server:stop({global,to_stop})),
  419:     ok.
  420: 
  421: crash(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  422:     error_logger_forwarder:register(),
  423: 
  424:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  425: 
  426:     %% This crash should not generate a crash report.
  427:     {ok,Pid0} = gen_server:start_link(?MODULE, [], []),
  428:     {'EXIT',{{shutdown,reason},_}} =
  429:  	(catch gen_server:call(Pid0, shutdown_reason)),
  430:     receive {'EXIT',Pid0,{shutdown,reason}} -> ok end,
  431: 
  432:     %% This crash should not generate a crash report.
  433:     {ok,Pid1} = gen_server:start_link(?MODULE, {state,state1}, []),
  434:     {'EXIT',{{shutdown,stop_reason},_}} =
  435: 	(catch gen_server:call(Pid1, stop_shutdown_reason)),
  436:     receive {'EXIT',Pid1,{shutdown,stop_reason}} -> ok end,
  437: 
  438:     %% This crash should not generate a crash report.
  439:     {ok,Pid2} = gen_server:start_link(?MODULE, [], []),
  440:     {'EXIT',{shutdown,_}} =
  441:  	(catch gen_server:call(Pid2, exit_shutdown)),
  442:     receive {'EXIT',Pid2,shutdown} -> ok end,
  443: 
  444:     %% This crash should not generate a crash report.
  445:     {ok,Pid3} = gen_server:start_link(?MODULE, {state,state3}, []),
  446:     {'EXIT',{shutdown,_}} =
  447: 	(catch gen_server:call(Pid3, stop_shutdown)),
  448:     receive {'EXIT',Pid3,shutdown} -> ok end,
  449: 
  450:     process_flag(trap_exit, false),
  451: 
  452:     %% This crash should generate a crash report and a report
  453:     %% from gen_server.
  454:     {ok,Pid4} = gen_server:start(?MODULE, {state,state4}, []),
  455:     {'EXIT',{crashed,_}} = (catch gen_server:call(Pid4, crash)),
  456:     ClientPid = self(),
  457:     receive
  458: 	{error,_GroupLeader4,{Pid4,
  459: 			      "** Generic server"++_,
  460: 			      [Pid4,crash,{formatted, state4},
  461: 			       {crashed,[{?MODULE,handle_call,3,_}
  462: 					 |_Stacktrace]},
  463: 			       ClientPid, [_|_] = _ClientStack]}} ->
  464: 	    ok;
  465: 	Other4a ->
  466: 	    io:format("Unexpected: ~p", [Other4a]),
  467: 	    ct:fail(failed)
  468:     end,
  469:     receive
  470: 	{error_report,_,{Pid4,crash_report,[List4|_]}} ->
  471: 	    {exit,crashed,[{?MODULE, handle_call, 3, _}|_]} = proplists:get_value(error_info, List4),
  472: 	    Pid4 = proplists:get_value(pid, List4);
  473: 	Other4 ->
  474: 	    io:format("Unexpected: ~p", [Other4]),
  475: 	    ct:fail(failed)
  476:     end,
  477: 
  478:     receive
  479: 	Any ->
  480: 	    io:format("Unexpected: ~p", [Any]),
  481: 	    ct:fail(failed)
  482:     after 500 ->
  483: 	    ok
  484:     end,
  485: 
  486:     ok.
  487: 
  488: %% --------------------------------------
  489: %% Test gen_server:call and handle_call.
  490: %% Test all different return values from
  491: %% handle_call.
  492: %% --------------------------------------
  493: 
  494: call(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  495:     OldFl = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  496: 
  497:     {ok, _Pid} =
  498: 	gen_server:start_link({local, my_test_name},
  499: 			      gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  500: 
  501:     ok = gen_server:call(my_test_name, started_p),
  502:     delayed = gen_server:call(my_test_name, {delayed_answer,1}),
  503: 
  504:     %% two requests within a specified time.
  505:     ok = gen_server:call(my_test_name, {call_within, 1000}),
  506:     timer:sleep(500),
  507:     ok = gen_server:call(my_test_name, next_call),
  508:     ok = gen_server:call(my_test_name, {call_within, 1000}),
  509:     timer:sleep(1500),
  510:     false = gen_server:call(my_test_name, next_call),
  511: 
  512:     %% timeout call.
  513:     delayed = gen_server:call(my_test_name, {delayed_answer,1}, 30),
  514:     {'EXIT',{timeout,_}} =
  515: 	(catch gen_server:call(my_test_name, {delayed_answer,30}, 1)),
  516: 
  517:     %% bad return value in the gen_server loop from handle_call.
  518:     {'EXIT',{{bad_return_value, badreturn},_}} =
  519: 	(catch gen_server:call(my_test_name, badreturn)),
  520: 
  521:     process_flag(trap_exit, OldFl),
  522:     ok.
  523: 
  524: %% --------------------------------------
  525: %% Test gen_server:send_request.
  526: %% --------------------------------------
  527: 
  528: send_request(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  529:     OldFl = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  530: 
  531:     {ok, Pid} = gen_server:start_link({local, my_test_name},
  532:                                       gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  533: 
  534:     Async = fun(Process, Req) ->
  535:                     try
  536:                         Promise = gen_server:send_request(Process, Req),
  537:                         gen_server:wait_response(Promise, infinity)
  538:                     catch _:Reason:ST ->
  539:                             {'did_exit', Reason, ST}
  540:                     end
  541:             end,
  542:     {reply,ok} = Async(my_test_name, started_p),
  543: 
  544:     {reply,delayed} = Async(Pid, {delayed_answer,1}),
  545: 
  546:     %% two requests within a specified time.
  547:     Promise1 = gen_server:send_request(my_test_name, {call_within, 1000}),
  548:     Promise2 = gen_server:send_request(my_test_name, next_call),
  549:     {reply, ok} = gen_server:wait_response(Promise1, infinity),
  550:     {reply, ok} = gen_server:wait_response(Promise2, infinity),
  551: 
  552:     Promise3 = gen_server:send_request(my_test_name, {call_within, 1000}),
  553:     no_reply = gen_server:check_response({foo, bar}, Promise3),
  554:     receive {[alias|Ref],_} = Msg when is_reference(Ref) ->
  555:             {reply, ok} = gen_server:check_response(Msg, Promise3)
  556:     after 1000 ->
  557:             %% Format changed which is ok. This test is just to make you
  558:             %% aware that you have changed it
  559:             exit(message_format_changed)
  560:     end,
  561:     timer:sleep(1500),
  562: 
  563:     {reply, false} = Async(my_test_name, next_call),
  564: 
  565:     %% timeout
  566:     Promise5 = gen_server:send_request(my_test_name, {delayed_answer,50}),
  567:     timeout = gen_server:wait_response(Promise5, 0),
  568:     {reply, delayed} = gen_server:wait_response(Promise5, infinity),
  569: 
  570:     %% bad return value in the gen_server loop from handle_call.
  571:     {error,{{bad_return_value, badreturn},_}} = Async(my_test_name, badreturn),
  572: 
  573:     %% Test other error cases
  574:     {error, {noproc,_}} = Async(Pid, started_p),
  575:     {error, {noproc,_}} = Async(my_test_name, started_p),
  576:     {error, {noconnection, _}} = Async({my_test_name, foo@node}, started_p),
  577: 
  578:     {error, {noproc,_}} = Async({global, non_existing}, started_p),
  579:     catch exit(whereis(dummy_via), foo),
  580:     {'EXIT', {badarg,_}} =
  581:         (catch gen_server:send_request({via, dummy_via, non_existing}, started_p)),
  582: 
  583:     %% Remote nodes
  584:     Via = dummy_via:reset(),
  585:     Remote = proplists:get_value(node,Config),
  586:     {ok, RPid} = rpc:call(Remote, gen_server, start, [{global, remote}, ?MODULE, [], []]),
  587:     dummy_via:register_name(remote, RPid),
  588:     {reply, ok} = Async(RPid, started_p),
  589:     {reply, ok} = Async({global, remote}, started_p),
  590:     {reply, ok} = Async({via, dummy_via, remote}, started_p),
  591:     {error, {shutdown, _}} = Async({global, remote}, stop_shutdown),
  592:     {error, {noproc, _}} = Async({global, remote}, started_p),
  593:     {error, {noproc, _}} = Async({via, dummy_via, remote}, started_p),
  594:     {error, {noproc, _}} = Async({via, dummy_via, non_existing}, started_p),
  595: 
  596:     {ok, _} = rpc:call(Remote, gen_server, start, [{local, remote}, ?MODULE, [], []]),
  597:     {reply, ok} = Async({remote, Remote}, started_p),
  598:     {error, {shutdown, _}} = Async({remote, Remote}, stop_shutdown),
  599:     {error, {noproc, _}} = Async({remote, Remote}, started_p),
  600: 
  601:     %% Cleanup
  602:     catch exit(Via, foo2),
  603:     receive {'EXIT', Via, foo2} -> ok end,
  604:     process_flag(trap_exit, OldFl),
  605:     ok.
  606: 
  607: send_request_receive_reqid_collection(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  608:     {ok, Pid1} = gen_server:start_link({local, my_test_name1},
  609:                                        gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  610:     {ok, Pid2} = gen_server:start_link({local, my_test_name2},
  611:                                        gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  612:     {ok, Pid3} = gen_server:start_link({local, my_test_name3},
  613:                                        gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  614:     send_request_receive_reqid_collection(Pid1, Pid2, Pid3),
  615:     send_request_receive_reqid_collection_timeout(Pid1, Pid2, Pid3),
  616:     send_request_receive_reqid_collection_error(Pid1, Pid2, Pid3),
  617:     unlink(Pid1),
  618:     exit(Pid1, kill),
  619:     unlink(Pid2),
  620:     exit(Pid2, kill),
  621:     unlink(Pid3),
  622:     exit(Pid3, kill),
  623:     false = is_process_alive(Pid1),
  624:     false = is_process_alive(Pid2),
  625:     false = is_process_alive(Pid3),
  626:     ok.
  627: 
  628: send_request_receive_reqid_collection(Pid1, Pid2, Pid3) ->
  629: 
  630:     ReqId0 = gen_server:send_request(Pid1, started_p),
  631: 
  632:     ReqIdC0 = gen_server:reqids_new(),
  633: 
  634:     ReqId1 = gen_server:send_request(Pid1, {delayed_answer,400}),
  635:     ReqIdC1 = gen_server:reqids_add(ReqId1, req1, ReqIdC0),
  636:     1 = gen_server:reqids_size(ReqIdC1),
  637: 
  638:     ReqIdC2 = gen_server:send_request(Pid2, {delayed_answer,1}, req2, ReqIdC1),
  639:     2 = gen_server:reqids_size(ReqIdC2),
  640: 
  641:     ReqIdC3 = gen_server:send_request(Pid3, {delayed_answer,200}, req3, ReqIdC2),
  642:     3 = gen_server:reqids_size(ReqIdC3),
  643:     
  644:     {{reply, delayed}, req2, ReqIdC4} = gen_server:receive_response(ReqIdC3, infinity, true),
  645:     2 = gen_server:reqids_size(ReqIdC4),
  646: 
  647:     {{reply, delayed}, req3, ReqIdC5} = gen_server:receive_response(ReqIdC4, 5678, true),
  648:     1 = gen_server:reqids_size(ReqIdC5),
  649: 
  650:     {{reply, delayed}, req1, ReqIdC6} = gen_server:receive_response(ReqIdC5, 5000, true),
  651:     0 = gen_server:reqids_size(ReqIdC6),
  652: 
  653:     no_request = gen_server:receive_response(ReqIdC6, 5000, true),
  654: 
  655:     {reply, ok} = gen_server:receive_response(ReqId0, infinity),
  656: 
  657:     ok.
  658: 
  659: send_request_receive_reqid_collection_timeout(Pid1, Pid2, Pid3) ->
  660: 
  661:     ReqId0 = gen_server:send_request(Pid1, started_p),
  662: 
  663:     ReqIdC0 = gen_server:reqids_new(),
  664: 
  665:     ReqId1 = gen_server:send_request(Pid1, {delayed_answer,1000}),
  666:     ReqIdC1 = gen_server:reqids_add(ReqId1, req1, ReqIdC0),
  667: 
  668:     ReqIdC2 = gen_server:send_request(Pid2, {delayed_answer,1}, req2, ReqIdC1),
  669: 
  670:     ReqId3 = gen_server:send_request(Pid3, {delayed_answer,500}),
  671:     ReqIdC3 = gen_server:reqids_add(ReqId3, req3, ReqIdC2),
  672: 
  673:     Deadline = erlang:monotonic_time(millisecond) + 100,
  674:     
  675:     {{reply, delayed}, req2, ReqIdC4} = gen_server:receive_response(ReqIdC3, {abs, Deadline}, true),
  676:     2 = gen_server:reqids_size(ReqIdC4),
  677: 
  678:     timeout = gen_server:receive_response(ReqIdC4, {abs, Deadline}, true),
  679: 
  680:     Abandoned = lists:sort([{ReqId1, req1}, {ReqId3, req3}]),
  681:     Abandoned = lists:sort(gen_server:reqids_to_list(ReqIdC4)),
  682: 
  683:     %% Make sure requests were abandoned...
  684:     timeout = gen_server:receive_response(ReqIdC4, {abs, Deadline+1000}, true),
  685: 
  686:     {reply, ok} = gen_server:receive_response(ReqId0, infinity),
  687: 
  688:     ok.
  689:     
  690: send_request_receive_reqid_collection_error(Pid1, Pid2, Pid3) ->
  691: 
  692:     ReqId0 = gen_server:send_request(Pid1, started_p),
  693: 
  694:     ReqIdC0 = gen_server:reqids_new(),
  695: 
  696:     ReqId1 = gen_server:send_request(Pid1, {delayed_answer,400}),
  697:     ReqIdC1 = gen_server:reqids_add(ReqId1, req1, ReqIdC0),
  698:     try
  699:         nope = gen_server:reqids_add(ReqId1, req2, ReqIdC1)
  700:     catch
  701:         error:badarg -> ok
  702:     end,
  703:  
  704:     unlink(Pid2),
  705:     ReqIdC2 = gen_server:send_request(Pid2, stop_shutdown, req2, ReqIdC1),
  706:     ReqIdC3 = gen_server:send_request(Pid3, {delayed_answer,200}, req3, ReqIdC2),
  707:     3 = gen_server:reqids_size(ReqIdC3),
  708:     
  709:     {{error, {shutdown, _}}, req2, ReqIdC4} = gen_server:receive_response(ReqIdC3, 2000, true),
  710:     2 = gen_server:reqids_size(ReqIdC4),
  711: 
  712:     {{reply, delayed}, req3, ReqIdC4} = gen_server:receive_response(ReqIdC4, infinity, false),
  713: 
  714:     {{reply, delayed}, req1, ReqIdC4} = gen_server:receive_response(ReqIdC4, infinity, false),
  715: 
  716:     {reply, ok} = gen_server:receive_response(ReqId0, infinity),
  717: 
  718:     ok.
  719: 
  720: send_request_wait_reqid_collection(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  721:     {ok, Pid1} = gen_server:start_link({local, my_test_name1},
  722:                                        gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  723:     {ok, Pid2} = gen_server:start_link({local, my_test_name2},
  724:                                        gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  725:     {ok, Pid3} = gen_server:start_link({local, my_test_name3},
  726:                                        gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  727:     send_request_wait_reqid_collection(Pid1, Pid2, Pid3),
  728:     send_request_wait_reqid_collection_timeout(Pid1, Pid2, Pid3),
  729:     send_request_wait_reqid_collection_error(Pid1, Pid2, Pid3),
  730:     unlink(Pid1),
  731:     exit(Pid1, kill),
  732:     unlink(Pid2),
  733:     exit(Pid2, kill),
  734:     unlink(Pid3),
  735:     exit(Pid3, kill),
  736:     false = is_process_alive(Pid1),
  737:     false = is_process_alive(Pid2),
  738:     false = is_process_alive(Pid3),
  739:     ok.
  740: 
  741: send_request_wait_reqid_collection(Pid1, Pid2, Pid3) ->
  742: 
  743:     ReqId0 = gen_server:send_request(Pid1, started_p),
  744: 
  745:     ReqIdC0 = gen_server:reqids_new(),
  746: 
  747:     ReqId1 = gen_server:send_request(Pid1, {delayed_answer,400}),
  748:     ReqIdC1 = gen_server:reqids_add(ReqId1, req1, ReqIdC0),
  749:     1 = gen_server:reqids_size(ReqIdC1),
  750: 
  751:     ReqIdC2 = gen_server:send_request(Pid2, {delayed_answer,1}, req2, ReqIdC1),
  752:     2 = gen_server:reqids_size(ReqIdC2),
  753: 
  754:     ReqIdC3 = gen_server:send_request(Pid3, {delayed_answer,200}, req3, ReqIdC2),
  755:     3 = gen_server:reqids_size(ReqIdC3),
  756:     
  757:     {{reply, delayed}, req2, ReqIdC4} = gen_server:wait_response(ReqIdC3, infinity, true),
  758:     2 = gen_server:reqids_size(ReqIdC4),
  759: 
  760:     {{reply, delayed}, req3, ReqIdC5} = gen_server:wait_response(ReqIdC4, 5678, true),
  761:     1 = gen_server:reqids_size(ReqIdC5),
  762: 
  763:     {{reply, delayed}, req1, ReqIdC6} = gen_server:wait_response(ReqIdC5, 5000, true),
  764:     0 = gen_server:reqids_size(ReqIdC6),
  765: 
  766:     no_request = gen_server:wait_response(ReqIdC6, 5000, true),
  767: 
  768:     {reply, ok} = gen_server:wait_response(ReqId0, infinity),
  769: 
  770:     ok.
  771: 
  772: send_request_wait_reqid_collection_timeout(Pid1, Pid2, Pid3) ->
  773: 
  774:     ReqId0 = gen_server:send_request(Pid1, started_p),
  775: 
  776:     ReqIdC0 = gen_server:reqids_new(),
  777: 
  778:     ReqId1 = gen_server:send_request(Pid1, {delayed_answer,1000}),
  779:     ReqIdC1 = gen_server:reqids_add(ReqId1, req1, ReqIdC0),
  780: 
  781:     ReqIdC2 = gen_server:send_request(Pid2, {delayed_answer,1}, req2, ReqIdC1),
  782: 
  783:     ReqId3 = gen_server:send_request(Pid3, {delayed_answer,500}),
  784:     ReqIdC3 = gen_server:reqids_add(ReqId3, req3, ReqIdC2),
  785: 
  786:     Deadline = erlang:monotonic_time(millisecond) + 100,
  787:     
  788:     {{reply, delayed}, req2, ReqIdC4} = gen_server:wait_response(ReqIdC3, {abs, Deadline}, true),
  789:     2 = gen_server:reqids_size(ReqIdC4),
  790: 
  791:     timeout = gen_server:wait_response(ReqIdC4, {abs, Deadline}, true),
  792: 
  793:     Unhandled = lists:sort([{ReqId1, req1}, {ReqId3, req3}]),
  794:     Unhandled = lists:sort(gen_server:reqids_to_list(ReqIdC4)),
  795: 
  796:     %% Make sure requests were not abandoned...
  797:     {{reply, delayed}, req3, ReqIdC4} = gen_server:wait_response(ReqIdC4, {abs, Deadline+1500}, false),
  798:     {{reply, delayed}, req1, ReqIdC4} = gen_server:wait_response(ReqIdC4, {abs, Deadline+1500}, false),
  799: 
  800:     {reply, ok} = gen_server:receive_response(ReqId0, infinity),
  801: 
  802:     ok.
  803:     
  804: send_request_wait_reqid_collection_error(Pid1, Pid2, Pid3) ->
  805: 
  806:     ReqId0 = gen_server:send_request(Pid1, started_p),
  807: 
  808:     ReqIdC0 = gen_server:reqids_new(),
  809: 
  810:     ReqId1 = gen_server:send_request(Pid1, {delayed_answer,400}),
  811:     ReqIdC1 = gen_server:reqids_add(ReqId1, req1, ReqIdC0),
  812:     try
  813:         nope = gen_server:reqids_add(ReqId1, req2, ReqIdC1)
  814:     catch
  815:         error:badarg -> ok
  816:     end,
  817:  
  818:     unlink(Pid2),
  819:     ReqIdC2 = gen_server:send_request(Pid2, stop_shutdown, req2, ReqIdC1),
  820:     ReqIdC3 = gen_server:send_request(Pid3, {delayed_answer,200}, req3, ReqIdC2),
  821:     3 = gen_server:reqids_size(ReqIdC3),
  822:     
  823:     {{error, {shutdown, _}}, req2, ReqIdC4} = gen_server:wait_response(ReqIdC3, 2000, true),
  824:     2 = gen_server:reqids_size(ReqIdC4),
  825: 
  826:     {{reply, delayed}, req3, ReqIdC4} = gen_server:wait_response(ReqIdC4, infinity, false),
  827: 
  828:     {{reply, delayed}, req1, ReqIdC4} = gen_server:wait_response(ReqIdC4, infinity, false),
  829: 
  830:     {reply, ok} = gen_server:wait_response(ReqId0, infinity),
  831: 
  832:     ok.
  833: 
  834: send_request_check_reqid_collection(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  835:     {ok, Pid1} = gen_server:start_link({local, my_test_name1},
  836:                                        gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  837:     {ok, Pid2} = gen_server:start_link({local, my_test_name2},
  838:                                        gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  839:     {ok, Pid3} = gen_server:start_link({local, my_test_name3},
  840:                                        gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
  841:     send_request_check_reqid_collection(Pid1, Pid2, Pid3),
  842:     send_request_check_reqid_collection_error(Pid1, Pid2, Pid3),
  843:     unlink(Pid1),
  844:     exit(Pid1, kill),
  845:     unlink(Pid2),
  846:     exit(Pid2, kill),
  847:     unlink(Pid3),
  848:     exit(Pid3, kill),
  849:     false = is_process_alive(Pid1),
  850:     false = is_process_alive(Pid2),
  851:     false = is_process_alive(Pid3),
  852:     ok.
  853: 
  854: send_request_check_reqid_collection(Pid1, Pid2, Pid3) ->
  855: 
  856:     ReqId0 = gen_server:send_request(Pid1, started_p),
  857: 
  858:     receive after 100 -> ok end,
  859: 
  860:     ReqIdC0 = gen_server:reqids_new(),
  861: 
  862:     ReqIdC1 = gen_server:send_request(Pid1, {delayed_answer,400}, req1, ReqIdC0),
  863:     1 = gen_server:reqids_size(ReqIdC1),
  864: 
  865:     ReqId2 = gen_server:send_request(Pid2, {delayed_answer,1}),
  866:     ReqIdC2 = gen_server:reqids_add(ReqId2, req2, ReqIdC1),
  867:     2 = gen_server:reqids_size(ReqIdC2),
  868: 
  869:     ReqIdC3 = gen_server:send_request(Pid3, {delayed_answer,200}, req3, ReqIdC2),
  870:     3 = gen_server:reqids_size(ReqIdC3),
  871: 
  872:     Msg0 = next_msg(),
  873:     no_reply = gen_server:check_response(Msg0, ReqIdC3, true),
  874:     
  875:     {{reply, delayed}, req2, ReqIdC4} = gen_server:check_response(next_msg(), ReqIdC3, true),
  876:     2 = gen_server:reqids_size(ReqIdC4),
  877: 
  878:     {{reply, delayed}, req3, ReqIdC5} = gen_server:check_response(next_msg(), ReqIdC4, true),
  879:     1 = gen_server:reqids_size(ReqIdC5),
  880: 
  881:     {{reply, delayed}, req1, ReqIdC6} = gen_server:check_response(next_msg(), ReqIdC5, true),
  882:     0 = gen_server:reqids_size(ReqIdC6),
  883: 
  884:     no_request = gen_server:check_response(Msg0, ReqIdC6, true),
  885: 
  886:     {reply, ok} = gen_server:check_response(Msg0, ReqId0),
  887: 
  888:     ok.
  889:     
  890: send_request_check_reqid_collection_error(Pid1, Pid2, Pid3) ->
  891: 
  892:     ReqId0 = gen_server:send_request(Pid1, started_p),
  893: 
  894:     receive after 100 -> ok end,
  895: 
  896:     ReqIdC0 = gen_server:reqids_new(),
  897: 
  898:     ReqId1 = gen_server:send_request(Pid1, {delayed_answer,400}),
  899:     ReqIdC1 = gen_server:reqids_add(ReqId1, req1, ReqIdC0),
  900: 
  901:     unlink(Pid2),
  902:     ReqIdC2 = gen_server:send_request(Pid2, stop_shutdown, req2, ReqIdC1),
  903: 
  904:     ReqIdC3 = gen_server:send_request(Pid3, {delayed_answer,200}, req3, ReqIdC2),
  905:     3 = gen_server:reqids_size(ReqIdC3),
  906: 
  907:     Msg0 = next_msg(),
  908: 
  909:     no_reply = gen_server:check_response(Msg0, ReqIdC3, true),
  910:     
  911:     {{error, {shutdown, _}}, req2, ReqIdC4} = gen_server:check_response(next_msg(), ReqIdC3, true),
  912:     2 = gen_server:reqids_size(ReqIdC4),
  913: 
  914:     {{reply, delayed}, req3, ReqIdC4} = gen_server:check_response(next_msg(), ReqIdC4, false),
  915: 
  916:     {{reply, delayed}, req1, ReqIdC4} = gen_server:check_response(next_msg(), ReqIdC4, false),
  917: 
  918:     {reply, ok} = gen_server:check_response(Msg0, ReqId0),
  919: 
  920:     ok.
  921: 
  922: next_msg() ->
  923:     receive M -> M end.
  924: 
  925: %% --------------------------------------
  926: %% Test handle_continue.
  927: %% --------------------------------------
  928: 
  929: continue(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  930:     {ok, Pid} = gen_server:start_link(gen_server_SUITE, {continue, self()}, []),
  931:     [{Pid, continue}, {Pid, after_continue}] = read_replies(Pid),
  932: 
  933:     gen_server:call(Pid, {continue_reply, self()}),
  934:     [{Pid, continue}, {Pid, after_continue}] = read_replies(Pid),
  935: 
  936:     gen_server:call(Pid, {continue_noreply, self()}),
  937:     [{Pid, continue}, {Pid, after_continue}] = read_replies(Pid),
  938: 
  939:     gen_server:cast(Pid, {continue_noreply, self()}),
  940:     [{Pid, continue}, {Pid, after_continue}] = read_replies(Pid),
  941: 
  942:     Pid ! {continue_noreply, self()},
  943:     [{Pid, continue}, {Pid, after_continue}] = read_replies(Pid),
  944: 
  945:     Pid ! {continue_continue, self()},
  946:     [{Pid, before_continue}, {Pid, continue}, {Pid, after_continue}] = read_replies(Pid),
  947: 
  948:     Ref = monitor(process, Pid),
  949:     Pid ! continue_stop,
  950:     verify_down_reason(Ref, Pid, normal).
  951: 
  952: read_replies(Pid) ->
  953:     receive
  954: 	{Pid, ack} -> read_replies()
  955:     after
  956: 	1000 -> ct:fail({continue, ack})
  957:     end.
  958: 
  959: read_replies() ->
  960:     receive
  961: 	Msg -> [Msg | read_replies()]
  962:     after
  963: 	0 -> []
  964:     end.
  965: 
  966: %% --------------------------------------
  967: %% Test call to nonexisting processes on remote nodes
  968: %% --------------------------------------
  969: 
  970: call_remote1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  971:     N = hubba,
  972:     Node = proplists:get_value(node,Config),
  973:     {ok, Pid} = rpc:call(Node, gen_server, start,
  974: 			 [{global, N}, ?MODULE, [], []]),
  975:     ok = (catch gen_server:call({global, N}, started_p, infinity)),
  976:     exit(Pid, boom),
  977:     {'EXIT', {Reason, _}} = (catch gen_server:call({global, N},
  978: 						   started_p, infinity)),
  979:     true = (Reason == noproc) orelse (Reason == boom),
  980:     ok.
  981: 
  982: call_remote2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  983:     N = hubba,
  984:     Node = proplists:get_value(node,Config),
  985: 
  986:     {ok, Pid} = rpc:call(Node, gen_server, start,
  987: 			 [{global, N}, ?MODULE, [], []]),
  988:     ok = (catch gen_server:call(Pid, started_p, infinity)),
  989:     exit(Pid, boom),
  990:     {'EXIT', {Reason, _}} = (catch gen_server:call(Pid,
  991: 						   started_p, infinity)),
  992:     true = (Reason == noproc) orelse (Reason == boom),
  993:     ok.
  994: 
  995: call_remote3(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  996:     Node = proplists:get_value(node,Config),
  997: 
  998:     {ok, Pid} = rpc:call(Node, gen_server, start,
  999: 			 [{local, piller}, ?MODULE, [], []]),
 1000:     ok = (catch gen_server:call({piller, Node}, started_p, infinity)),
 1001:     exit(Pid, boom),
 1002:     {'EXIT', {Reason, _}} = (catch gen_server:call({piller, Node},
 1003: 						   started_p, infinity)),
 1004:     true = (Reason == noproc) orelse (Reason == boom),
 1005:     ok.
 1006: 
 1007: %% --------------------------------------
 1008: %% Test call to nonexisting node
 1009: %% --------------------------------------
 1010: 
 1011: call_remote_n1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1012:     N = hubba,
 1013:     Node = proplists:get_value(node,Config),
 1014:     {ok, _Pid} = rpc:call(Node, gen_server, start,
 1015: 			  [{global, N}, ?MODULE, [], []]),
 1016:     peer:stop(proplists:get_value(peer,Config)),
 1017:     {'EXIT', {noproc, _}} =
 1018: 	(catch gen_server:call({global, N}, started_p, infinity)),
 1019: 
 1020:     ok.
 1021: 
 1022: call_remote_n2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1023:     N = hubba,
 1024:     Node = proplists:get_value(node,Config),
 1025: 
 1026:     {ok, Pid} = rpc:call(Node, gen_server, start,
 1027: 			 [{global, N}, ?MODULE, [], []]),
 1028:     peer:stop(proplists:get_value(peer,Config)),
 1029:     {'EXIT', {{nodedown, Node}, _}} = (catch gen_server:call(Pid,
 1030: 							     started_p, infinity)),
 1031: 
 1032:     ok.
 1033: 
 1034: call_remote_n3(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1035:     Node = proplists:get_value(node,Config),
 1036: 
 1037:     {ok, _Pid} = rpc:call(Node, gen_server, start,
 1038: 			  [{local, piller}, ?MODULE, [], []]),
 1039:     peer:stop(proplists:get_value(peer,Config)),
 1040:     {'EXIT', {{nodedown, Node}, _}} = (catch gen_server:call({piller, Node},
 1041: 							     started_p, infinity)),
 1042: 
 1043:     ok.
 1044: 
 1045: %% --------------------------------------
 1046: %% Other bad calls
 1047: %% --------------------------------------
 1048: 
 1049: calling_self(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1050:     {'EXIT', {calling_self, _}} = (catch gen_server:call(self(), oops)),
 1051:     {'EXIT', {calling_self, _}} = (catch gen_server:call(self(), oops, infinity)),
 1052:     ok.
 1053: 
 1054: %% --------------------------------------
 1055: %% Test gen_server:cast and handle_cast.
 1056: %% Test all different return values from
 1057: %% handle_cast.
 1058: %% --------------------------------------
 1059: 
 1060: cast(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1061:     {ok, Pid} =
 1062: 	gen_server:start({local, my_test_name},
 1063: 			 gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
 1064: 
 1065:     ok = gen_server:call(my_test_name, started_p),
 1066: 
 1067:     ok = gen_server:cast(my_test_name, {self(),handle_cast}),
 1068:     receive
 1069: 	{Pid, handled_cast} ->
 1070: 	    ok
 1071:     after 1000 ->
 1072: 	    ct:fail(handle_cast)
 1073:     end,
 1074: 
 1075:     ok = gen_server:cast(my_test_name, {self(),delayed_cast,1}),
 1076:     receive
 1077: 	{Pid, delayed} ->
 1078: 	    ok
 1079:     after 1000 ->
 1080: 	    ct:fail(delayed_cast)
 1081:     end,
 1082: 
 1083:     ok = gen_server:cast(my_test_name, {self(),stop}),
 1084:     receive
 1085: 	{Pid, stopped} ->
 1086: 	    ok
 1087:     after 1000 ->
 1088: 	    ct:fail(stop)
 1089:     end,
 1090:     ok.
 1091: 
 1092: %% Test that cast really return immediately.
 1093: cast_fast(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1094:     {ok,Peer,Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 1095:     %% After starting a slave, it takes a little while until global knows
 1096:     %% about it, even if nodes() includes it, so we make sure that global
 1097:     %% knows about it before registering something on all nodes.
 1098:     ok = global:sync(),
 1099:     {_,"@"++Host} = lists:splitwith(fun ($@) -> false; (_) -> true end,
 1100: 				    atom_to_list(Node)),
 1101:     FalseNode = list_to_atom("hopp@"++Host),
 1102:     true = rpc:cast(Node, ?MODULE, cast_fast_messup, []),
 1103:     ct:sleep(1000),
 1104:     [Node] = nodes(),
 1105:     {Time,ok} = timer:tc(fun() ->
 1106: 				 gen_server:cast({hopp,FalseNode}, hopp)
 1107: 			 end),
 1108:     peer:stop(Peer),
 1109:     if Time > 1000000 ->       % Default listen timeout is about 7.0 s
 1110: 	    ct:fail(hanging_cast);
 1111:        true ->
 1112: 	    ok
 1113:     end.
 1114: 
 1115: cast_fast_messup() ->
 1116:     %% Register a false node: hopp@hostname
 1117:     unregister(erl_epmd),
 1118:     {ok, _} = erl_epmd:start_link(),
 1119:     {ok,S} = gen_tcp:listen(0, []),
 1120:     {ok,P} = inet:port(S),
 1121:     {ok,_Creation} = erl_epmd:register_node(hopp, P),
 1122:     receive after infinity -> ok end.
 1123: 
 1124: %% --------------------------------------
 1125: %% Test handle_info.
 1126: %% --------------------------------------
 1127: 
 1128: info(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1129:     {ok, Pid} =
 1130: 	gen_server:start({local, my_test_name},
 1131: 			 gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
 1132: 
 1133:     ok = gen_server:call(my_test_name, started_p),
 1134: 
 1135:     Pid ! {self(),handle_info},
 1136:     receive
 1137: 	{Pid, handled_info} ->
 1138: 	    ok
 1139:     after 1000 ->
 1140: 	    ct:fail(handle_info)
 1141:     end,
 1142: 
 1143:     Pid ! {self(),delayed_info,1},
 1144:     receive
 1145: 	{Pid, delayed_info} ->
 1146: 	    ok
 1147:     after 1000 ->
 1148: 	    ct:fail(delayed_info)
 1149:     end,
 1150: 
 1151:     Pid ! {self(),stop},
 1152:     receive
 1153: 	{Pid, stopped_info} ->
 1154: 	    ok
 1155:     after 1000 ->
 1156: 	    ct:fail(stop_info)
 1157:     end,
 1158:     ok.
 1159: 
 1160: hibernate(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1161:     OldFl = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1162:     {ok, Pid0} =
 1163: 	gen_server:start_link({local, my_test_name_hibernate0},
 1164: 			      gen_server_SUITE, hibernate, []),
 1165:     is_in_erlang_hibernate(Pid0),
 1166:     ok = gen_server:call(my_test_name_hibernate0, stop),
 1167:     receive 
 1168: 	{'EXIT', Pid0, stopped} ->
 1169:  	    ok
 1170:     after 5000 ->
 1171: 	    ct:fail(gen_server_did_not_die)
 1172:     end,
 1173: 
 1174:     {ok, Pid} =
 1175: 	gen_server:start_link({local, my_test_name_hibernate},
 1176: 			      gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
 1177: 
 1178:     ok = gen_server:call(my_test_name_hibernate, started_p),
 1179:     true = gen_server:call(my_test_name_hibernate, hibernate),
 1180:     is_in_erlang_hibernate(Pid),
 1181:     Parent = self(),
 1182:     Fun = fun() ->
 1183: 		  receive go -> ok end,
 1184: 		  receive after 1000 -> ok end,
 1185: 		  X = erlang:process_info(Pid, current_function),
 1186:  		  Pid ! continue,
 1187:  		  Parent ! {result,X}
 1188:  	  end,
 1189:     Pid2 = spawn_link(Fun),
 1190:     true = gen_server:call(my_test_name_hibernate, {hibernate_noreply,Pid2}),
 1191: 
 1192:     gen_server:cast(my_test_name_hibernate, hibernate_later),
 1193:     true = ({current_function,{erlang,hibernate,3}} =/=
 1194: 		erlang:process_info(Pid, current_function)),
 1195:     is_in_erlang_hibernate(Pid),
 1196:     ok = gen_server:call(my_test_name_hibernate, started_p),
 1197:     true = ({current_function,{erlang,hibernate,3}} =/=
 1198: 		erlang:process_info(Pid, current_function)),
 1199: 
 1200:     gen_server:cast(my_test_name_hibernate, hibernate_now),
 1201:     is_in_erlang_hibernate(Pid),
 1202:     ok = gen_server:call(my_test_name_hibernate, started_p),
 1203:     true = ({current_function,{erlang,hibernate,3}} =/=
 1204: 		erlang:process_info(Pid, current_function)),
 1205: 
 1206:     Pid ! hibernate_later,
 1207:     true = ({current_function,{erlang,hibernate,3}} =/=
 1208: 		erlang:process_info(Pid, current_function)),
 1209:     is_in_erlang_hibernate(Pid),
 1210:     ok = gen_server:call(my_test_name_hibernate, started_p),
 1211:     true = ({current_function,{erlang,hibernate,3}} =/=
 1212: 		erlang:process_info(Pid, current_function)),
 1213: 
 1214:     Pid ! hibernate_now,
 1215:     is_in_erlang_hibernate(Pid),
 1216:     ok = gen_server:call(my_test_name_hibernate, started_p),
 1217:     true = ({current_function,{erlang,hibernate,3}} =/=
 1218: 		erlang:process_info(Pid, current_function)),
 1219:     receive
 1220: 	{result,R} ->
 1221: 	    {current_function,{erlang,hibernate,3}} = R
 1222:     end,
 1223: 
 1224:     true = gen_server:call(my_test_name_hibernate, hibernate),
 1225:     is_in_erlang_hibernate(Pid),
 1226:     sys:suspend(my_test_name_hibernate),
 1227:     is_in_erlang_hibernate(Pid),
 1228:     sys:resume(my_test_name_hibernate),
 1229:     is_in_erlang_hibernate(Pid),
 1230:     ok = gen_server:call(my_test_name_hibernate, started_p),
 1231:     true = ({current_function,{erlang,hibernate,3}} =/= erlang:process_info(Pid,current_function)),
 1232: 
 1233:     ok = gen_server:call(my_test_name_hibernate, stop),
 1234:     receive 
 1235: 	{'EXIT', Pid, stopped} ->
 1236:  	    ok
 1237:     after 5000 ->
 1238: 	    ct:fail(gen_server_did_not_die)
 1239:     end,
 1240:     process_flag(trap_exit, OldFl),
 1241:     ok.
 1242: 
 1243: auto_hibernate(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1244:     OldFl = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1245:     HibernateAfterTimeout = 100,
 1246:     State = {auto_hibernate_state},
 1247:     {ok, Pid} =
 1248:         gen_server:start_link({local, my_test_name_auto_hibernate},
 1249:             gen_server_SUITE, {state,State}, [{hibernate_after, HibernateAfterTimeout}]),
 1250:     %% After init test
 1251:     is_not_in_erlang_hibernate(Pid),
 1252:     timer:sleep(HibernateAfterTimeout),
 1253:     is_in_erlang_hibernate(Pid),
 1254:     %% Get state test
 1255:     State = sys:get_state(my_test_name_auto_hibernate),
 1256:     is_in_erlang_hibernate(Pid),
 1257:     %% Call test
 1258:     ok = gen_server:call(my_test_name_auto_hibernate, started_p),
 1259:     is_not_in_erlang_hibernate(Pid),
 1260:     timer:sleep(HibernateAfterTimeout),
 1261:     is_in_erlang_hibernate(Pid),
 1262:     %% Cast test
 1263:     ok = gen_server:cast(my_test_name_auto_hibernate, {self(),handle_cast}),
 1264:     receive
 1265:         {Pid, handled_cast} ->
 1266:             ok
 1267:     after 1000 ->
 1268:         ct:fail(cast)
 1269:     end,
 1270:     is_not_in_erlang_hibernate(Pid),
 1271:     timer:sleep(HibernateAfterTimeout),
 1272:     is_in_erlang_hibernate(Pid),
 1273:     %% Info test
 1274:     Pid ! {self(),handle_info},
 1275:     receive
 1276:         {Pid, handled_info} ->
 1277:             ok
 1278:     after 1000 ->
 1279:         ct:fail(info)
 1280:     end,
 1281:     is_not_in_erlang_hibernate(Pid),
 1282:     timer:sleep(HibernateAfterTimeout),
 1283:     is_in_erlang_hibernate(Pid),
 1284: 
 1285:     ok = gen_server:call(my_test_name_auto_hibernate, stop),
 1286:     receive
 1287:         {'EXIT', Pid, stopped} ->
 1288:             ok
 1289:     after 5000 ->
 1290:         ct:fail(gen_server_did_not_die)
 1291:     end,
 1292:     process_flag(trap_exit, OldFl),
 1293:     ok.
 1294: 
 1295: is_in_erlang_hibernate(Pid) ->
 1296:     receive after 1 -> ok end,
 1297:     is_in_erlang_hibernate_1(200, Pid).
 1298: 
 1299: is_in_erlang_hibernate_1(0, Pid) ->
 1300:     io:format("~p\n", [erlang:process_info(Pid, current_function)]),
 1301:     ct:fail(not_in_erlang_hibernate_3);
 1302: is_in_erlang_hibernate_1(N, Pid) ->
 1303:     {current_function,MFA} = erlang:process_info(Pid, current_function),
 1304:     case MFA of
 1305: 	{erlang,hibernate,3} ->
 1306: 	    ok;
 1307: 	_ ->
 1308: 	    receive after 10 -> ok end,
 1309: 	    is_in_erlang_hibernate_1(N-1, Pid)
 1310:     end.
 1311: 
 1312: is_not_in_erlang_hibernate(Pid) ->
 1313:     receive after 1 -> ok end,
 1314:     is_not_in_erlang_hibernate_1(200, Pid).
 1315: 
 1316: is_not_in_erlang_hibernate_1(0, Pid) ->
 1317:     io:format("~p\n", [erlang:process_info(Pid, current_function)]),
 1318:     ct:fail(not_in_erlang_hibernate_3);
 1319: is_not_in_erlang_hibernate_1(N, Pid) ->
 1320:     {current_function,MFA} = erlang:process_info(Pid, current_function),
 1321:     case MFA of
 1322:         {erlang,hibernate,3} ->
 1323:             receive after 10 -> ok end,
 1324:             is_not_in_erlang_hibernate_1(N-1, Pid);
 1325:         _ ->
 1326:             ok
 1327:     end.
 1328: 
 1329: %% --------------------------------------
 1330: %% Test gen_server:abcast and handle_cast.
 1331: %% Test all different return values from
 1332: %% handle_cast.
 1333: %% --------------------------------------
 1334: 
 1335: abcast(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1336:     {ok, Pid} =
 1337: 	gen_server:start({local, my_test_name},
 1338: 			 gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
 1339: 
 1340:     ok = gen_server:call(my_test_name, started_p),
 1341: 
 1342:     abcast = gen_server:abcast(my_test_name, {self(),handle_cast}),
 1343:     receive
 1344: 	{Pid, handled_cast} ->
 1345: 	    ok
 1346:     after 1000 ->
 1347: 	    ct:fail(abcast)
 1348:     end,
 1349: 
 1350:     abcast = gen_server:abcast([node()], my_test_name,
 1351: 			       {self(),delayed_cast,1}),
 1352:     receive
 1353: 	{Pid, delayed} ->
 1354: 	    ok
 1355:     after 1000 ->
 1356: 	    ct:fail(delayed_abcast)
 1357:     end,
 1358: 
 1359:     abcast = gen_server:abcast(my_test_name, {self(),stop}),
 1360:     receive
 1361: 	{Pid, stopped} ->
 1362: 	    ok
 1363:     after 1000 ->
 1364: 	    ct:fail(abcast_stop)
 1365:     end,
 1366:     ok.
 1367: 
 1368: %% --------------------------------------
 1369: %% Test gen_server:multicall and handle_call.
 1370: %% Test all different return values from
 1371: %% handle_call.
 1372: %% --------------------------------------
 1373: 
 1374: multicall(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1375:     OldFl = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1376: 
 1377:     {ok, Pid} =
 1378: 	gen_server:start_link({local, my_test_name},
 1379: 			      gen_server_SUITE, [], []),
 1380: 
 1381:     ok = gen_server:call(my_test_name, started_p),
 1382:     Nodes = nodes(),
 1383:     Node = node(),
 1384:     {[{Node,delayed}],Nodes} =
 1385: 	gen_server:multi_call(my_test_name, {delayed_answer,1}),
 1386: 
 1387:     %% two requests within a specified time.
 1388:     {[{Node,ok}],[]} =
 1389: 	gen_server:multi_call([Node], my_test_name, {call_within, 1000}),
 1390:     timer:sleep(500),
 1391:     {[{Node,ok}],[]} =
 1392: 	gen_server:multi_call([Node], my_test_name, next_call),
 1393:     {[{Node,ok}],[]} =
 1394: 	gen_server:multi_call([Node], my_test_name, {call_within, 1000}),
 1395:     timer:sleep(1500),
 1396:     {[{Node,false}],[]} =
 1397: 	gen_server:multi_call([Node],my_test_name, next_call),
 1398: 
 1399:     %% Stop the server.
 1400:     {[{Node,ok}],[]} =
 1401: 	gen_server:multi_call([Node],my_test_name, stop),
 1402:     receive
 1403: 	{'EXIT', Pid, stopped} -> ok
 1404:     after 1000 ->
 1405: 	    ct:fail(multicall_stop)
 1406:     end,
 1407: 
 1408:     process_flag(trap_exit, OldFl),
 1409: 
 1410:     ok.
 1411: 
 1412: %% OTP-3587
 1413: multicall_down(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1414:     %% We need a named host which is inaccessible.
 1415:     Name = node@test01,
 1416: 
 1417:     %% We use 'global' as a gen_server to call.
 1418:     {Good, Bad} = gen_server:multi_call([Name, node()],
 1419: 					global_name_server,
 1420: 					info,
 1421: 					3000),
 1422:     io:format("good = ~p, bad = ~p~n", [Good, Bad]),
 1423:     [Name] = Bad,
 1424:     ok.
 1425: 
 1426: busy_wait_for_process(Pid,N) ->
 1427:     case erlang:is_process_alive(Pid) of
 1428: 	true ->
 1429: 	    receive
 1430: 	    after 100 ->
 1431: 		    ok
 1432: 	    end,
 1433: 	    busy_wait_for_process(Pid,N-1);
 1434: 	_ ->
 1435: 	    ok
 1436:     end.
 1437: %%--------------------------------------------------------------
 1438: %% Test gen_server:enter_loop/[3,4,5]. Used when you want to write
 1439: %% your own special init-phase.
 1440: spec_init(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1441: 
 1442:     OldFlag = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1443: 
 1444:     {ok, Pid0} = start_link(spec_init_local, [{ok, my_server}, []]),
 1445:     ok = gen_server:call(Pid0, started_p),
 1446:     ok = gen_server:call(Pid0, stop),
 1447:     receive 
 1448: 	{'EXIT', Pid0, stopped} ->
 1449:  	    ok
 1450:     after 5000 ->
 1451: 	    ct:fail(gen_server_did_not_die)
 1452:     end,
 1453: 
 1454:     {ok, Pid01} = start_link(spec_init_local, [{not_ok, my_server}, []]),
 1455:     receive 
 1456:  	{'EXIT', Pid01, process_not_registered} ->
 1457:  	    ok
 1458:     after 5000 ->
 1459: 	    ct:fail(gen_server_did_not_die)
 1460:     end,
 1461: 
 1462:     {ok, Pid1} = start_link(spec_init_global, [{ok, my_server}, []]),
 1463:     ok = gen_server:call(Pid1, started_p),
 1464:     ok = gen_server:call(Pid1, stop),
 1465:     receive 
 1466: 	{'EXIT', Pid1, stopped} ->
 1467:  	    ok
 1468:     after 5000 ->
 1469: 	    ct:fail(gen_server_did_not_die)
 1470:     end,
 1471: 
 1472:     {ok, Pid11} =
 1473: 	start_link(spec_init_global, [{not_ok, my_server}, []]),
 1474: 
 1475:     receive 
 1476: 	{'EXIT', Pid11, process_not_registered_globally} ->
 1477:  	    ok
 1478:     after 5000 ->
 1479: 	    ct:fail(gen_server_did_not_die)
 1480:     end,
 1481: 
 1482:     {ok, Pid2} = start_link(spec_init_anonymous, [[]]),
 1483:     ok = gen_server:call(Pid2, started_p),
 1484:     ok = gen_server:call(Pid2, stop),
 1485:     receive 
 1486: 	{'EXIT', Pid2, stopped} ->
 1487:  	    ok
 1488:     after 5000 ->
 1489: 	    ct:fail(gen_server_did_not_die)
 1490:     end,
 1491: 
 1492:     {ok, Pid3} = start_link(spec_init_anonymous_default_timeout, [[]]),
 1493:     ok = gen_server:call(Pid3, started_p),
 1494:     ok = gen_server:call(Pid3, stop),
 1495:     receive 
 1496: 	{'EXIT', Pid3, stopped} ->
 1497:  	    ok
 1498:     after 5000 ->
 1499: 	    ct:fail(gen_server_did_not_die)
 1500:     end,
 1501: 
 1502:     {ok, Pid4} =
 1503: 	start_link(spec_init_default_timeout, [{ok, my_server}, []]),
 1504:     ok = gen_server:call(Pid4, started_p),
 1505:     ok = gen_server:call(Pid4, stop),
 1506:     receive 
 1507: 	{'EXIT', Pid4, stopped} ->
 1508:  	    ok
 1509:     after 5000 ->
 1510: 	    ct:fail(gen_server_did_not_die)
 1511:     end,
 1512: 
 1513:     %% Before the OTP-10130 fix this failed because a timeout message
 1514:     %% was generated as the spawned process crashed because a {global, Name}
 1515:     %% was matched as a timeout value instead of matching on scope.
 1516:     {ok, _PidHurra} =
 1517: 	start_link(spec_init_global_default_timeout, [{ok, hurra}, []]),
 1518:     timer:sleep(1000),
 1519:     ok = gen_server:call(_PidHurra, started_p),
 1520: 
 1521:     Pid5 =
 1522: 	erlang:spawn_link(?MODULE, spec_init_not_proc_lib, [[]]),
 1523:     receive 
 1524: 	{'EXIT', Pid5, process_was_not_started_by_proc_lib} ->
 1525:  	    ok
 1526:     after 5000 ->
 1527: 	    ct:fail(gen_server_did_not_die)
 1528:     end,
 1529:     process_flag(trap_exit, OldFlag),
 1530:     ok.
 1531: 
 1532: %%--------------------------------------------------------------
 1533: %% OTP-4820. Test that terminate is run when the parent is a locally
 1534: %% registered process.

 1536:

 1538:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1539:

 1541:

 1547: 	    ct:fail(stop)
 1548:     end,

 1576: %% Test check for registered name in enter_loop/3,4,5.
 1577: otp_5854(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1578:     OldFlag = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1579: 
 1580:     dummy_via:reset(),
 1581: 
 1582:     %% Make sure gen_server:enter_loop does not accept {local,Name}
 1583:     %% when it's another process than the calling one which is
 1584:     %% registered under that name

 1587: 	start_link(spec_init_local, [{not_ok, armitage}, []]),
 1588:     receive
 1589: 	{'EXIT', Pid1, process_not_registered} ->
 1590: 	    ok

 1592: 	    ct:fail(gen_server_started)
 1593:     end,
 1594:     unregister(armitage),
 1595: 
 1596:     %% Make sure gen_server:enter_loop does not accept {global,Name}
 1597:     %% when it's another process than the calling one which is
 1598:     %% registered under that name
 1599:     global:register_name(armitage, self()),
 1600:     {ok, Pid2} =
 1601: 	start_link(spec_init_global, [{not_ok, armitage}, []]),
 1602:     receive
 1603: 	{'EXIT', Pid2, process_not_registered_globally} ->
 1604: 	    ok
 1605:     after 1000 ->
 1606: 	    ct:fail(gen_server_started)
 1607:     end,

 1609:

 1613: 	start_link(spec_init_via, [{not_ok, armitage}, []]),
 1614:     receive
 1615: 	{'EXIT', Pid3, {process_not_registered_via, dummy_via}} ->
 1616: 	    ok
 1617:     after 1000 ->
 1618: 	    ct:fail(gen_server_started)
 1619:     end,

 1624: 
 1625: %% If initialization fails (with ignore or {stop,Reason}),
 1626: %% make sure that the process is not registered when gen_server:start()
 1627: %% returns.
 1628: 
 1629: otp_7669(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1630:     do_times(100, fun do_otp_7669_local_ignore/0),
 1631:     do_times(100, fun do_otp_7669_global_ignore/0),
 1632:     do_times(10, fun do_otp_7669_stop/0),
 1633:     ok.    
 1634: 
 1635: do_times(0, _) ->
 1636:     ok;
 1637: do_times(N, Fun) ->
 1638:     Fun(),
 1639:     do_times(N-1, Fun).
 1640: 
 1641: do_otp_7669_local_ignore() ->
 1642:     %% The name should never be registered after the return
 1643:     %% from gen_server:start/3.
 1644:     ignore = gen_server:start({local,?MODULE}, ?MODULE, ignore, []),
 1645:     undefined = whereis(?MODULE),
 1646:     ignore = gen_server:start({local,?MODULE}, ?MODULE, ignore, []),
 1647:     undefined = whereis(?MODULE),
 1648:     ignore = gen_server:start_link({local,?MODULE}, ?MODULE, ignore, []),
 1649:     undefined = whereis(?MODULE).
 1650: 
 1651: do_otp_7669_global_ignore() ->
 1652:     ignore = gen_server:start({global,?MODULE}, ?MODULE, ignore, []),
 1653:     undefined = global:whereis_name(?MODULE),
 1654:     ignore = gen_server:start_link({global,?MODULE}, ?MODULE, ignore, []),
 1655:     undefined = global:whereis_name(?MODULE).
 1656: 
 1657: do_otp_7669_stop() ->
 1658:     %% The name should never be registered after the return
 1659:     %% from gen_server:start/3.
 1660:     {error,stopped} = gen_server:start({local,?MODULE},
 1661: 				       ?MODULE, stop, []),
 1662:     undefined = whereis(?MODULE),
 1663: 
 1664:     {error,stopped} = gen_server:start({global,?MODULE},
 1665: 				       ?MODULE, stop, []),
 1666:     undefined = global:whereis_name(?MODULE).
 1667: 
 1668: %% Verify that sys:get_status correctly calls our format_status/1,2 fun.
 1669: call_format_status(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1670:     OldFl = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1671:     call_format_status(?MODULE, format_status_called),
 1672:     call_format_status(format_status_server,{data,[{"State",format_status_called}]}),
 1673:     process_flag(trap_exit, OldFl).
 1674: call_format_status(Module, Match) when is_atom(Module) ->
 1675: 
 1676:     Parent = self(),
 1677: 
 1678:     {ok, Pid} = gen_server:start_link({local, call_format_status},
 1679: 				      Module, [], []),
 1680:     Status1 = sys:get_status(call_format_status),
 1681:     {status, Pid, Mod, [_Pdict1, running, Parent, _, Data1]} = Status1,
 1682:     [Match | _] = lists:reverse(Data1),
 1683:     Status2 = sys:get_status(call_format_status, 5000),
 1684:     {status, Pid, Mod, [_Pdict2, running, Parent, _, Data2]} = Status2,
 1685:     [Match | _] = lists:reverse(Data2),
 1686:     gen_server:call(Pid, stop),
 1687:     receive {'EXIT',_,_} -> ok end,
 1688: 
 1689:     %% check that format_status can handle a name being a pid (atom is
 1690:     %% already checked by the previous test)
 1691:     {ok, Pid3} = gen_server:start_link(Module, [], []),
 1692:     Status3 = sys:get_status(Pid3),
 1693:     {status, Pid3, Mod, [_PDict3, running, Parent, _, Data3]} = Status3,
 1694:     [Match | _] = lists:reverse(Data3),
 1695:     gen_server:call(Pid3, stop),
 1696:     receive {'EXIT',_,_} -> ok end,
 1697: 
 1698:     %% check that format_status can handle a name being a term other than a
 1699:     %% pid or atom
 1700:     GlobalName1 = {global, "CallFormatStatus"},
 1701:     {ok, Pid4} = gen_server:start_link(GlobalName1, Module, [], []),
 1702:     Status4 = sys:get_status(Pid4),
 1703:     {status, Pid4, Mod, [_PDict4, running, Parent, _, Data4]} = Status4,
 1704:     [Match | _] = lists:reverse(Data4),
 1705:     gen_server:call(Pid4, stop),
 1706:     receive {'EXIT',_,_} -> ok end,
 1707:     GlobalName2 = {global, {name, "term"}},
 1708:     {ok, Pid5} = gen_server:start_link(GlobalName2, Module, [], []),
 1709:     Status5 = sys:get_status(GlobalName2),
 1710:     {status, Pid5, Mod, [_PDict5, running, Parent, _, Data5]} = Status5,
 1711:     [Match | _] = lists:reverse(Data5),
 1712:     gen_server:call(Pid5, stop),
 1713:     receive {'EXIT',_,_} -> ok end,
 1714:     ok.
 1715: 
 1716: %% Verify that error termination correctly calls our format_status/1,2 fun.
 1717: error_format_status(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1718:     error_logger_forwarder:register(),
 1719:     OldFl = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1720:     error_format_status(?MODULE),
 1721:     error_format_status(format_status_server),
 1722:     process_flag(trap_exit, OldFl);
 1723: error_format_status(Module) when is_atom(Module) ->
 1724: 
 1725:     State = "called format_status",
 1726:     {ok, Pid} = gen_server:start_link(Module, {state, State}, []),
 1727:     {'EXIT',{crashed,_}} = (catch gen_server:call(Pid, crash)),
 1728:     receive
 1729: 	{'EXIT', Pid, crashed} ->
 1730: 	    ok
 1731:     end,
 1732:     ClientPid = self(),
 1733:     receive
 1734: 	{error,_GroupLeader,{Pid,
 1735: 			     "** Generic server"++_,
 1736: 			     [Pid,crash,{formatted, State},
 1737: 			      {crashed,[{?MODULE,handle_call,3,_}
 1738: 					|_Stacktrace]},
 1739: 			       ClientPid, [_|_] = _ClientStack]}} ->
 1740: 	    ok;
 1741: 	Other ->
 1742: 	    ct:pal("Unexpected: ~p", [Other]),
 1743: 	    ct:fail(failed)
 1744:     end,
 1745:     receive
 1746:         {error_report,_,_} -> ok
 1747:     end,
 1748:     ok.
 1749: 
 1750: %% Verify that error when terminating correctly calls our format_status/1,2 fun
 1751: terminate_crash_format(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1752:     error_logger_forwarder:register(),
 1753:     OldFl = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1754:     terminate_crash_format(?MODULE),
 1755:     terminate_crash_format(format_status_server),
 1756:     process_flag(trap_exit, OldFl);
 1757: terminate_crash_format(Module) when is_atom(Module) ->
 1758:     State = crash_terminate,
 1759:     {ok, Pid} = gen_server:start_link(Module, {state, State}, []),
 1760:     gen_server:call(Pid, stop),
 1761:     receive {'EXIT', Pid, {crash, terminate}} -> ok end,
 1762:     ClientPid = self(),
 1763:     receive
 1764: 	{error,_GroupLeader,{Pid,
 1765: 			     "** Generic server"++_,
 1766: 			     [Pid,stop, {formatted, State},
 1767: 			      {{crash, terminate},
 1768: 			       [{?MODULE,terminate,2,_}|_Stacktrace]},
 1769: 			       ClientPid, [_|_] = _ClientStack]}} ->
 1770: 	    ok;
 1771: 	Other ->
 1772: 	    io:format("Unexpected: ~p", [Other]),
 1773: 	    ct:fail(failed)
 1774:     after 5000 ->
 1775: 	    io:format("Timeout: expected error logger msg", []),
 1776: 	    ct:fail(failed)
 1777:     end,
 1778:     receive
 1779:         {error_report,_,_} -> ok
 1780:     end,
 1781:     ok.

 1783: crash_in_format_status(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1784:     error_logger_forwarder:register(),
 1785:     OldFl = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1786:     crash_in_format_status(?MODULE, "gen_server_SUITE:format_status/2 crashed"),
 1787:     crash_in_format_status(format_status_server, "format_status_server:format_status/1 crashed"),
 1788:     process_flag(trap_exit, OldFl).

 1790:     State = fun(_) -> exit({crash,format_status}) end,
 1791:     {ok, Pid} = gen_server:start_link(Module, {state, State}, []),

 1794:     {data,[{"State",Match}]} = lists:last(Info),

 1797:     receive {'EXIT', Pid, stopped} -> ok end,

 1800: 	{error,_GroupLeader,
 1801:          {Pid,
 1802:           "** Generic server"++_,
 1803:           [Pid, stop, Match, stopped,
 1804:            ClientPid, [_|_] = _ClientStack]}} ->
 1805: 	    ok;
 1806: 	Other ->
 1807: 	    ct:pal("Unexpected: ~p", [Other]),
 1808: 	    ct:fail(failed)
 1809:     after 5000 ->
 1810: 	    io:format("Timeout: expected error logger msg", []),
 1811: 	    ct:fail(failed)
 1812:     end,
 1813:     receive
 1814:         {error_report,_,_} -> ok
 1815:     end,
 1816:     ok.

 1818: throw_in_format_status(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1819:     error_logger_forwarder:register(),
 1820:     OldFl = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1821:     throw_in_format_status(?MODULE,{throw,format_status}),
 1822:     throw_in_format_status(format_status_server,"format_status_server:format_status/1 crashed"),
 1823:     process_flag(trap_exit, OldFl).
 1824: throw_in_format_status(Module, Match) when is_atom(Module) ->
 1825:     State = fun(_) -> throw({throw,format_status}) end,
 1826:     {ok, Pid} = gen_server:start_link(Module, {state, State}, []),
 1827: 
 1828:     {status,Pid, _, [_,_,_,_,Info]} = sys:get_status(Pid),
 1829:     case lists:last(Info) of
 1830:         {data,[{"State",Match}]} ->
 1831:             ok;
 1832:         Match ->
 1833:             ok
 1834:     end,
