 1837:     receive {'EXIT', Pid, stopped} -> ok end,
 1838:     ClientPid = self(),
 1839:     receive
 1840: 	{error,_GroupLeader,
 1841:          {Pid, "** Generic server"++_,
 1842:           [Pid, stop, Match, stopped,
 1843:            ClientPid, [_|_] = _ClientStack]}} ->
 1844: 	    ok;
 1845: 	Other ->
 1846: 	    ct:pal("Unexpected: ~p", [Other]),
 1847: 	    ct:fail(failed)
 1848:     after 5000 ->
 1849: 	    io:format("Timeout: expected error logger msg", []),
 1850: 	    ct:fail(failed)
 1851:     end,
 1852:     receive
 1853:         {error_report,_,_} -> ok
 1854:     end,
 1855:     ok.
 1856: 
 1857: %% Test that the state, reason, message format status calls works as they should
 1858: %% The test makes sure that both sys:get_status and the crash report works as they
 1859: %% should and can be used to strip data from both the reason, message, state and the
 1860: %% sys logger logs.
 1861: 
 1862: %%%% The sys logger log messages that should be matched
 1863: -define(LOG_MESSAGES,
 1864:         {log,{in,{_,_,started_p}}},
 1865:         {log,{out,ok,_,State}},
 1866:         {log,{in,{_,_,{delayed_answer,10}}}},
 1867:         {log,{noreply,{_,_,State}}},
 1868:         {log,{in,timeout}},
 1869:         {log,{noreply,State}}).
 1870: 
 1871: format_all_status(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1872:     error_logger_forwarder:register(),
 1873:     OldFl = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1874: 
 1875:     State = fun(M) ->
 1876:                     maps:map(
 1877:                       fun(log, Values) ->
 1878:                               [{log, Value} || Value <- Values];
 1879:                          (Key, Value) ->
 1880:                               {Key, Value}
 1881:                       end, M)
 1882:             end,
 1883:     {ok, Pid} = gen_server:start_link(format_status_server, {state, State}, []),
 1884:     sys:log(Pid, true),
 1885:     ok = gen_server:call(Pid, started_p),
 1886:     delayed = gen_server:call(Pid, {delayed_answer, 10}),
 1887: 
 1888:     {status,Pid, _, [_,_,_,_,Info]} = sys:get_status(Pid),
 1889:     [{header, _Hdr},
 1890:      {data, [_Status,_Parent,{"Logged events",LoggedEvents}]},
 1891:      {data, [{"State",{state,State}}]}] = Info,
 1892: 
 1893:     [?LOG_MESSAGES] = LoggedEvents,
 1894: 
 1895:     ok = gen_server:call(Pid, stop),
 1896:     receive {'EXIT', Pid, stopped} -> ok end,
 1897:     ClientPid = self(),
 1898:     receive
 1899: 	{error,_GroupLeader,
 1900:          {Pid, "** Generic server"++_,
 1901:           [Pid, {message, stop}, {state,State}, {reason, stopped},
 1902:            ?LOG_MESSAGES, {log,{in,{_,_,stop}}},
 1903:            ClientPid, [_|_] = _ClientStack]}} ->
 1904: 	    ok;
 1905: 	Other ->
 1906: 	    ct:pal("Unexpected: ~p", [Other]),
 1907: 	    ct:fail(failed)
 1908:     after 5000 ->
 1909: 	    io:format("Timeout: expected error logger msg", []),
 1910: 	    ct:fail(failed)
 1911:     end,
 1912:     receive
 1913:         {error_report,_,_} -> ok
 1914:     end,
 1915: 
 1916:     {ok, Pid2} = gen_server:start_link(format_status_server, {state, State}, []),
 1917:     catch gen_server:call(Pid2, crash),
 1918:     receive {'EXIT', Pid2, crashed} -> ok end,
 1919:     receive
 1920: 	{error,_GroupLeader2,
 1921:          {Pid2, "** Generic server"++_,
 1922:           [Pid2, {message, crash}, {state,State},
 1923:            {{reason, crashed},[_|_] = _ServerStack},
 1924:            ClientPid, [_|_] = _ClientStack2]}} ->
 1925: 	    ok;
 1926: 	Other2 ->
 1927: 	    ct:pal("Unexpected: ~p", [Other2]),
 1928: 	    ct:fail(failed)
 1929:     after 5000 ->
 1930: 	    io:format("Timeout: expected error logger msg", []),
 1931: 	    ct:fail(failed)
 1932:     end,
 1933:     receive
 1934:         {error_report,_,_} -> ok
 1935:     end,
 1936: 
 1937:     process_flag(trap_exit, OldFl).
 1938: 
 1939: %% Verify that sys:get_state correctly returns gen_server state
 1940: get_state(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1941:     State = self(),
 1942:     {ok, _Pid} = gen_server:start_link({local, get_state},
 1943: 				       ?MODULE, {state,State}, []),
 1944:     State = sys:get_state(get_state),
 1945:     State = sys:get_state(get_state, 5000),
 1946:     {ok, Pid} = gen_server:start_link(?MODULE, {state,State}, []),
 1947:     State = sys:get_state(Pid),
 1948:     State = sys:get_state(Pid, 5000),
 1949:     ok = sys:suspend(Pid),
 1950:     State = sys:get_state(Pid),
 1951:     ok = sys:resume(Pid),
 1952:     ok.
 1953: 
 1954: %% Verify that sys:replace_state correctly replaces gen_server state
 1955: replace_state(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1956:     State = self(),
 1957:     {ok, _Pid} = gen_server:start_link({local, replace_state},
 1958: 				       ?MODULE, {state,State}, []),
 1959:     State = sys:get_state(replace_state),
 1960:     NState1 = "replaced",
 1961:     Replace1 = fun(_) -> NState1 end,
 1962:     NState1 = sys:replace_state(replace_state, Replace1),
 1963:     NState1 = sys:get_state(replace_state),
 1964:     {ok, Pid} = gen_server:start_link(?MODULE, {state,NState1}, []),
 1965:     NState1 = sys:get_state(Pid),
 1966:     Suffix = " again",
 1967:     NState2 = NState1 ++ Suffix,
 1968:     Replace2 = fun(S) -> S ++ Suffix end,
 1969:     NState2 = sys:replace_state(Pid, Replace2, 5000),
 1970:     NState2 = sys:get_state(Pid, 5000),
 1971:     %% verify no change in state if replace function crashes
 1972:     Replace3 = fun(_) -> throw(fail) end,
 1973:     {'EXIT',{{callback_failed,
 1974: 	      {gen_server,system_replace_state},{throw,fail}},_}} =
 1975: 	(catch sys:replace_state(Pid, Replace3)),
 1976:     NState2 = sys:get_state(Pid, 5000),
 1977:     %% verify state replaced if process sys suspended
 1978:     ok = sys:suspend(Pid),
 1979:     Suffix2 = " and again",
 1980:     NState3 = NState2 ++ Suffix2,
 1981:     Replace4 = fun(S) -> S ++ Suffix2 end,
 1982:     NState3 = sys:replace_state(Pid, Replace4),
 1983:     ok = sys:resume(Pid),
 1984:     NState3 = sys:get_state(Pid, 5000),
 1985:     ok.
 1986: 
 1987: %% Test that the time for a huge message queue is not
 1988: %% significantly slower than with an empty message queue.
 1989: call_with_huge_message_queue(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1990:     Pid = spawn_link(fun echo_loop/0),
 1991: 
 1992:     {Time,ok} = tc(fun() -> calls(10000, Pid) end),
 1993: 
 1994:     _ = [self() ! {msg,N} || N <- lists:seq(1, 500000)],
 1995:     erlang:garbage_collect(),
 1996:     {NewTime,ok} = tc(fun() -> calls(10000, Pid) end),
 1997:     io:format("Time for empty message queue: ~p", [Time]),
 1998:     io:format("Time for huge message queue: ~p", [NewTime]),
 1999: 
 2000:     IsCover = test_server:is_cover(),
 2001:     case (NewTime+1) / (Time+1) of
 2002: 	Q when Q < 10; IsCover ->
 2003: 	    ok;
 2004: 	Q ->
 2005: 	    io:format("Q = ~p", [Q]),
 2006: 	    ct:fail(failed)
 2007:     end,
 2008:     ok.
 2009: 
 2010: calls(0, _) -> ok;
 2011: calls(N, Pid) ->
 2012:     {ultimate_answer,42} = call(Pid, {ultimate_answer,42}),
 2013:     calls(N-1, Pid).
 2014: 
 2015: call(Pid, Msg) ->
 2016:     gen_server:call(Pid, Msg, infinity).
 2017: 
 2018: tc(Fun) ->
 2019:     timer:tc(erlang, apply, [Fun,[]]).
 2020: 
 2021: echo_loop() ->
 2022:     receive
 2023: 	{'$gen_call',{Pid,Ref},Msg} ->
 2024: 	    Pid ! {Ref,Msg},
 2025: 	    echo_loop()
 2026:     end.
 2027: 
 2028: %% Test the default implementation of terminate if the callback module
 2029: %% does not export it
 2030: undef_terminate1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2031:     {ok, Server} = oc_server:start(),
 2032:     MRef = monitor(process, Server),
 2033:     ok = gen_server:stop(Server),
 2034:     ok = verify_down_reason(MRef, Server, normal).
 2035: 
 2036: %% Test the default implementation of terminate if the callback module
 2037: %% does not export it
 2038: undef_terminate2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2039:     {ok, Server} = oc_server:start(),
 2040:     MRef = monitor(process, Server),
 2041:     ok = gen_server:stop(Server, {error, test}, infinity),
 2042:     ok = verify_down_reason(MRef, Server, {error, test}).
 2043: 
 2044: %% Start should return an undef error if init isn't implemented
 2045: undef_init(_Config) ->
 2046:     {error, {undef, [{oc_init_server, init, [_], _}|_]}} =
 2047:         gen_server:start(oc_init_server, [], []),
 2048:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 2049:     {error, {undef, [{oc_init_server, init, [_], _}|_]}} =
 2050:         (catch gen_server:start_link(oc_init_server, [], [])),
 2051:     receive
 2052:         {'EXIT', Server,
 2053:          {undef, [{oc_init_server, init, [_], _}|_]}} when is_pid(Server) ->
 2054:             ok
 2055:     after 1000 ->
 2056:         ct:fail(expected_exit_msg)
 2057:     end.
 2058: 
 2059: %% The upgrade should fail if code_change is expected in the callback module
 2060: %% but not exported, but the server should continue with the old code
 2061: undef_code_change(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2062:     {ok, Server} = oc_server:start(),
 2063:     {error, {'EXIT', {undef, [{oc_server, code_change, [_, _, _], _}|_]}}}
 2064:         = fake_upgrade(Server, ?MODULE),
 2065:     true = is_process_alive(Server).
 2066: 
 2067: %% The server should crash if the handle_call callback is
 2068: %% not exported in the callback module
 2069: undef_handle_call(_Config) ->
 2070:     {ok, Server} = oc_server:start(),
 2071:     try
 2072:         gen_server:call(Server, call_msg),
 2073:         ct:fail(should_crash)
 2074:     catch exit:{{undef, [{oc_server, handle_call, _, _}|_]},
 2075:                 {gen_server, call, _}} ->
 2076:         ok
 2077:     end.
 2078: 
 2079: %% The server should crash if the handle_cast callback is
 2080: %% not exported in the callback module
 2081: undef_handle_cast(_Config) ->
 2082:     {ok, Server} = oc_server:start(),
 2083:     MRef = monitor(process, Server),
 2084:     gen_server:cast(Server, cast_msg),
 2085:     verify_undef_down(MRef, Server, oc_server, handle_cast),
 2086:     ok.
 2087: 
 2088: %% The server should crash if the handle_continue callback is
 2089: %% not exported in the callback module
 2090: undef_handle_continue(_Config) ->
 2091:     {ok, Server} = oc_server:start(continue),
 2092:     MRef = monitor(process, Server),
 2093:     verify_undef_down(MRef, Server, oc_server, handle_continue),
 2094:     ok.
 2095: 
 2096: %% The server should log but not crash if the handle_info callback is
 2097: %% calling an undefined function
 2098: undef_handle_info(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2099:     error_logger_forwarder:register(),
 2100:     {ok, Server} = oc_server:start(),
 2101:     Server ! hej,
 2102:     wait_until_processed(Server, hej, 10),
 2103:     true = is_process_alive(Server),
 2104:     receive
 2105:         {warning_msg, _GroupLeader,
 2106:          {Server, "** Undefined handle_info in " ++ _, [oc_server, hej]}} ->
 2107:             ok;
 2108:         Other ->
 2109:             io:format("Unexpected: ~p", [Other]),
 2110:             ct:fail(failed)
 2111:     end.
 2112: 
 2113: %% Test that the default implementation of terminate isn't catching the
 2114: %% wrong undef error
 2115: undef_in_terminate(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2116:     State = {undef_in_terminate, {oc_server, terminate}},
 2117:     {ok, Server} = gen_server:start(?MODULE, {state, State}, []),
 2118:     try
 2119:         ok = gen_server:stop(Server),
 2120:         ct:fail(failed)
 2121:     catch
 2122:         exit:{undef, [{oc_server, terminate, [], _}|_]} ->
 2123:             ok
 2124:     end.
 2125: 
 2126: %% Test that the default implementation of handle_info isn't catching the
 2127: %% wrong undef error
 2128: undef_in_handle_info(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2129:      {ok, Server} = gen_server:start(?MODULE, [], []),
 2130:      MRef = monitor(process, Server),
 2131:      Server ! {call_undef_fun, ?MODULE, handle_info},
 2132:      verify_undef_down(MRef, Server, ?MODULE, handle_info),
 2133:      ok.
 2134: 
 2135: verify_down_reason(MRef, Server, Reason) ->
 2136:     receive
 2137:         {'DOWN', MRef, process, Server, Reason} ->
 2138:             ok
 2139:     after 5000 ->
 2140:         ct:fail(failed)
 2141:     end.
 2142: 
 2143: verify_undef_down(MRef, Pid, Mod, Fun) ->
 2144:     ok = receive
 2145:         {'DOWN', MRef, process, Pid,
 2146:          {undef, [{Mod, Fun, _, _}|_]}} ->
 2147:             ok
 2148:     after 5000 ->
 2149:         ct:fail(should_crash)
 2150:     end.
 2151: 
 2152: fake_upgrade(Pid, Mod) ->
 2153:     sys:suspend(Pid),
 2154:     sys:replace_state(Pid, fun(State) -> {new, State} end),
 2155:     Ret = sys:change_code(Pid, Mod, old_vsn, []),
 2156:     ok = sys:resume(Pid),
 2157:     Ret.
 2158: 
 2159: wait_until_processed(_Pid, _Message, 0) ->
 2160:     ct:fail(not_processed);
 2161: wait_until_processed(Pid, Message, N) ->
 2162:     {messages, Messages} = erlang:process_info(Pid, messages),
 2163:     case lists:member(Message, Messages) of
 2164:         true ->
 2165:             timer:sleep(100),
 2166:             wait_until_processed(Pid, Message, N-1);
 2167:         false ->
 2168:             ok
 2169:     end.
 2170: 
 2171: %% Test report callback for Logger handler error_logger
 2172: format_log_1(_Config) ->
 2173:     FD = application:get_env(kernel,error_logger_format_depth),
 2174:     application:unset_env(kernel,error_logger_format_depth),
 2175:     Term = lists:seq(1,15),
 2176:     Name = self(),
 2177:     Report = #{label=>{gen_server,terminate},
 2178:                name=>Name,
 2179:                last_message=>Term,
 2180:                state=>Term,
 2181:                log=>[],
 2182:                reason=>Term,
 2183:                client_info=>{self(),{clientname,[]}}},
 2184:     {F1,A1} = gen_server:format_log(Report),
 2185:     FExpected1 = "** Generic server ~tp terminating \n"
 2186:         "** Last message in was ~tp~n"
 2187:         "** When Server state == ~tp~n"
 2188:         "** Reason for termination ==~n** ~tp~n"
 2189:         "** Client ~tp stacktrace~n"
 2190:         "** ~tp~n",
 2191:     ct:log("F1: ~ts~nA1: ~tp",[F1,A1]),
 2192:     FExpected1=F1,
 2193:     [Name,Term,Term,Term,clientname,[]] = A1,
 2194: 
 2195:     Warning = #{label=>{gen_server,no_handle_info},
 2196:                 module=>?MODULE,
 2197:                 message=>Term},
 2198:     {WF1,WA1} = gen_server:format_log(Warning),
 2199:     WFExpected1 = "** Undefined handle_info in ~p~n"
 2200:         "** Unhandled message: ~tp~n",
 2201:     ct:log("WF1: ~ts~nWA1: ~tp",[WF1,WA1]),
 2202:     WFExpected1=WF1,
 2203:     [?MODULE,Term] = WA1,
 2204: 
 2205:     Depth = 10,
 2206:     ok = application:set_env(kernel,error_logger_format_depth,Depth),
 2207:     Limited = [1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8,9,'...'],
 2208:     {F2,A2} = gen_server:format_log(#{label=>{gen_server,terminate},
 2209:                                       name=>Name,
 2210:                                       last_message=>Term,
 2211:                                       state=>Term,
 2212:                                       log=>[],
 2213:                                       reason=>Term,
 2214:                                       client_info=>{self(),{clientname,[]}}}),
 2215:     FExpected2 = "** Generic server ~tP terminating \n"
 2216:         "** Last message in was ~tP~n"
 2217:         "** When Server state == ~tP~n"
 2218:         "** Reason for termination ==~n** ~tP~n"
 2219:         "** Client ~tP stacktrace~n"
 2220:         "** ~tP~n",
 2221:     ct:log("F2: ~ts~nA2: ~tp",[F2,A2]),
 2222:     FExpected2=F2,
 2223:     [Name,Depth,Limited,Depth,Limited,Depth,Limited,Depth,
 2224:      clientname,Depth,[],Depth] = A2,
 2225: 
 2226:     {WF2,WA2} = gen_server:format_log(Warning),
 2227:     WFExpected2 = "** Undefined handle_info in ~p~n"
 2228:         "** Unhandled message: ~tP~n",
 2229:     ct:log("WF2: ~ts~nWA2: ~tp",[WF2,WA2]),
 2230:     WFExpected2=WF2,
 2231:     [?MODULE,Limited,Depth] = WA2,
 2232: 
 2233:     case FD of
 2234:         undefined ->
 2235:             application:unset_env(kernel,error_logger_format_depth);
 2236:         _ ->
 2237:             application:set_env(kernel,error_logger_format_depth,FD)
 2238:     end,
 2239:     ok.
 2240: 
 2241: %% Test report callback for any Logger handler
 2242: format_log_2(_Config) ->
 2243:     Term = lists:seq(1,15),
 2244:     Name = self(),
 2245:     NameStr = pid_to_list(Name),
 2246:     Report = #{label=>{gen_server,terminate},
 2247:                name=>Name,
 2248:                last_message=>Term,
 2249:                state=>Term,
 2250:                log=>[],
 2251:                reason=>Term,
 2252:                client_info=>{self(),{clientname,[]}}},
 2253:     FormatOpts1 = #{},
 2254:     Str1 = flatten_format_log(Report,FormatOpts1),
 2255:     L1 = length(Str1),
 2256:     Expected1 = "** Generic server "++NameStr++" terminating \n"
 2257:         "** Last message in was ",
 2258:     ct:log("Str1: ~ts",[Str1]),
 2259:     ct:log("length(Str1): ~p",[L1]),
 2260:     true = lists:prefix(Expected1,Str1),
 2261: 
 2262:     Warning = #{label=>{gen_server,no_handle_info},
 2263:                 module=>?MODULE,
 2264:                 message=>Term},
 2265:     WStr1 = flatten_format_log(Warning,FormatOpts1),
 2266:     WL1 = length(WStr1),
 2267:     WExpected1 = "** Undefined handle_info in gen_server_SUITE\n"
 2268:         "** Unhandled message: ",
 2269:     ct:log("WStr1: ~ts",[WStr1]),
 2270:     ct:log("length(WStr1): ~p",[WL1]),
 2271:     true = lists:prefix(WExpected1,WStr1),
 2272: 
 2273:     Depth = 10,
 2274:     FormatOpts2 = #{depth=>Depth},
 2275:     Str2 = flatten_format_log(Report,FormatOpts2),
 2276:     L2 = length(Str2),
 2277:     Expected2 = "** Generic server "++NameStr++" terminating \n"
 2278:         "** Last message in was ",
 2279:     ct:log("Str2: ~ts",[Str2]),
 2280:     ct:log("length(Str2): ~p",[L2]),
 2281:     true = lists:prefix(Expected2,Str2),
 2282:     true = L2<L1,
 2283: 
 2284:     WStr2 = flatten_format_log(Warning,FormatOpts2),
 2285:     WL2 = length(WStr2),
 2286:     WExpected2 = "** Undefined handle_info in gen_server_SUITE\n"
 2287:         "** Unhandled message: ",
 2288:     ct:log("WStr2: ~ts",[WStr2]),
 2289:     ct:log("length(WStr2): ~p",[WL2]),
 2290:     true = lists:prefix(WExpected2,WStr2),
 2291:     true = WL2<WL1,
 2292: 
 2293:     FormatOpts3 = #{chars_limit=>200},
 2294:     Str3 = flatten_format_log(Report,FormatOpts3),
 2295:     L3 = length(Str3),
 2296:     Expected3 = "** Generic server "++NameStr++" terminating \n"
 2297:         "** Last message in was ",
 2298:     ct:log("Str3: ~ts",[Str3]),
 2299:     ct:log("length(Str3): ~p",[L3]),
 2300:     true = lists:prefix(Expected3,Str3),
 2301:     true = L3<L1,
 2302: 
 2303:     WFormatOpts3 = #{chars_limit=>80},
 2304:     WStr3 = flatten_format_log(Warning,WFormatOpts3),
 2305:     WL3 = length(WStr3),
 2306:     WExpected3 = "** Undefined handle_info in gen_server_SUITE\n"
 2307:         "** Unhandled message: ",
 2308:     ct:log("WStr3: ~ts",[WStr3]),
 2309:     ct:log("length(WStr3): ~p",[WL3]),
 2310:     true = lists:prefix(WExpected3,WStr3),
 2311:     true = WL3<WL1,
 2312: 
 2313:     FormatOpts4 = #{single_line=>true},
 2314:     Str4 = flatten_format_log(Report,FormatOpts4),
 2315:     L4 = length(Str4),
 2316:     Expected4 = "Generic server "++NameStr++" terminating. Reason: ",
 2317:     ct:log("Str4: ~ts",[Str4]),
 2318:     ct:log("length(Str4): ~p",[L4]),
 2319:     true = lists:prefix(Expected4,Str4),
 2320:     true = L4<L1,
 2321: 
 2322:     WStr4 = flatten_format_log(Warning,FormatOpts4),
 2323:     WL4 = length(WStr4),
 2324:     WExpected4 = "Undefined handle_info in gen_server_SUITE. "
 2325:         "Unhandled message: ",
 2326:     ct:log("WStr4: ~ts",[WStr4]),

 2329:     true = WL4<WL1,
 2330:

 2332:     Str5 = flatten_format_log(Report,FormatOpts5),
 2333:     L5 = length(Str5),
 2334:     Expected5 = "Generic server "++NameStr++" terminating. Reason: ",
 2335:     ct:log("Str5: ~ts",[Str5]),
 2336:     ct:log("length(Str5): ~p",[L5]),
 2337:     true = lists:prefix(Expected5,Str5),
 2338:     true = L5<L4,
 2339: 
 2340:     WStr5 = flatten_format_log(Warning,FormatOpts5),
 2341:     WL5 = length(WStr5),
 2342:     WExpected5 = "Undefined handle_info in gen_server_SUITE. "
 2343:         "Unhandled message: ",
 2344:     ct:log("WStr5: ~ts",[WStr5]),
 2345:     ct:log("length(WStr5): ~p",[WL5]),
 2346:     true = lists:prefix(WExpected5,WStr5),
 2347:     true = WL5<WL4,
 2348: 
 2349:     FormatOpts6 = #{single_line=>true, chars_limit=>200},
 2350:     Str6 = flatten_format_log(Report,FormatOpts6),
 2351:     L6 = length(Str6),
 2352:     Expected6 = "Generic server "++NameStr++" terminating. Reason: ",
 2353:     ct:log("Str6: ~ts",[Str6]),
 2354:     ct:log("length(Str6): ~p",[L6]),
 2355:     true = lists:prefix(Expected6,Str6),
 2356:     true = L6<L4,
 2357: 
 2358:     WFormatOpts6 = #{single_line=>true, chars_limit=>80},
 2359:     WStr6 = flatten_format_log(Warning,WFormatOpts6),
 2360:     WL6 = length(WStr6),
 2361:     WExpected6 = "Undefined handle_info in gen_server_SUITE. "
 2362:         "Unhandled message: ",
 2363:     ct:log("WStr6: ~ts",[WStr6]),
 2364:     ct:log("length(WStr6): ~p",[WL6]),
 2365:     true = lists:prefix(WExpected6,WStr6),
 2366:     true = WL6<WL4,
 2367: 
 2368:     ok.
 2369: 
 2370: flatten_format_log(Report, Format) ->
 2371:     lists:flatten(gen_server:format_log(Report, Format)).
 2372: 
 2373: reply_by_alias_with_payload(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2374:     %% "Payload" version of tag not used yet, but make sure
 2375:     %% gen_server:reply/2 works with it...
 2376:     %%
 2377:     %% Whitebox...
 2378:     Reply = make_ref(),
 2379:     Alias = alias(),
 2380:     Tag = [[alias|Alias], "payload"],
 2381:     spawn_link(fun () ->
 2382:                        gen_server:reply({undefined, Tag},
 2383:                                         Reply)
 2384:                end),
 2385:     receive
 2386:         {[[alias|Alias]|_] = Tag, Reply} ->
 2387:             ok
 2388:     end,
 2389:     %% Check gen:reply/2 as well...
 2390:     Reply2 = make_ref(),
 2391:     Alias2 = alias(),
 2392:     Tag2 = [[alias|Alias2], "payload"],
 2393:     spawn_link(fun () ->
 2394:                        gen:reply({undefined, Tag2},
 2395:                                  Reply2)
 2396:                end),
 2397:     receive
 2398:         {[[alias|Alias2]|_] = Tag2, Reply2} ->
 2399:             ok
 2400:     end.
 2401: 
 2402: %%--------------------------------------------------------------
 2403: %% Help functions to spec_init_*
 2404: start_link(Init, Options) ->
 2405:     proc_lib:start_link(?MODULE, Init, Options).
 2406: 
 2407: spec_init_local({ok, Name}, Options) ->
 2408:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 2409:     register(Name, self()),
 2410:     proc_lib:init_ack({ok, self()}),
 2411:     %% Supervised init can occur here  ...
 2412:     gen_server:enter_loop(?MODULE, Options, {}, {local, Name}, infinity);
 2413: 
 2414: spec_init_local({not_ok, Name}, Options) ->
 2415:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 2416:     proc_lib:init_ack({ok, self()}),
 2417:     %% Supervised init can occur here  ...
 2418:     gen_server:enter_loop(?MODULE, Options, {}, {local, Name}, infinity).
 2419: 
 2420: spec_init_global({ok, Name}, Options) ->
 2421:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 2422:     global:register_name(Name, self()),
 2423:     proc_lib:init_ack({ok, self()}),
 2424:     %% Supervised init can occur here  ...
 2425:     gen_server:enter_loop(?MODULE, Options, {}, {global, Name}, infinity);
 2426: 
 2427: spec_init_global({not_ok, Name}, Options) ->
 2428:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 2429:     proc_lib:init_ack({ok, self()}),
 2430:     %% Supervised init can occur here  ...
 2431:     gen_server:enter_loop(?MODULE, Options, {}, {global, Name}, infinity).
 2432: 
 2433: spec_init_via({ok, Name}, Options) ->
 2434:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 2435:     dummy_via:register_name(Name, self()),
 2436:     proc_lib:init_ack({ok, self()}),
 2437:     %% Supervised init can occur here  ...
 2438:     gen_server:enter_loop(?MODULE, Options, {},
 2439: 			  {via, dummy_via, Name}, infinity);
 2440: 
 2441: spec_init_via({not_ok, Name}, Options) ->
 2442:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 2443:     proc_lib:init_ack({ok, self()}),
 2444:     %% Supervised init can occur here  ...
 2445:     gen_server:enter_loop(?MODULE, Options, {},
 2446: 			  {via, dummy_via, Name}, infinity).
 2447: 
 2448: spec_init_default_timeout({ok, Name}, Options) ->
 2449:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 2450:     register(Name, self()),
 2451:     proc_lib:init_ack({ok, self()}),
 2452:     %% Supervised init can occur here  ...
 2453:     gen_server:enter_loop(?MODULE, Options, {}, {local, Name}).
 2454: 
 2455: %% OTP-10130, A bug was introduced where global scope was not matched when
 2456: %% enter_loop/4 was called (no timeout).
 2457: spec_init_global_default_timeout({ok, Name}, Options) ->
 2458:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 2459:     global:register_name(Name, self()),
 2460:     proc_lib:init_ack({ok, self()}),
 2461:     %% Supervised init can occur here  ...
 2462:     gen_server:enter_loop(?MODULE, Options, {}, {global, Name}).
 2463: 
 2464: spec_init_anonymous(Options) ->
 2465:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 2466:     proc_lib:init_ack({ok, self()}),
 2467:     %% Supervised init can occur here  ...
 2468:     gen_server:enter_loop(?MODULE, Options, {}, infinity).
 2469: 
 2470: spec_init_anonymous_default_timeout(Options) ->
 2471:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 2472:     proc_lib:init_ack({ok, self()}),
 2473:     %% Supervised init can occur here  ...
 2474:     gen_server:enter_loop(?MODULE, Options, {}).
 2475: 
 2476: spec_init_not_proc_lib(Options) ->
 2477:     gen_server:enter_loop(?MODULE, Options, {}, infinity).
 2478: 
 2479: %%% --------------------------------------------------------
 2480: %%% Here is the tested gen_server behaviour.
 2481: %%% --------------------------------------------------------
 2482: 
 2483: init([]) ->
 2484:     {ok, []};
 2485: init(ignore) ->
 2486:     ignore;
 2487: init(stop) ->
 2488:     {stop, stopped};
 2489: init(hibernate) ->
 2490:     {ok,[],hibernate};
 2491: init(sleep) ->
 2492:     ct:sleep(1000),
 2493:     {ok, []};
 2494: init({continue, Pid}) ->
 2495:     self() ! {after_continue, Pid},
 2496:     {ok, [], {continue, {message, Pid}}};
 2497: init({state,State}) ->
 2498:     {ok,State}.
 2499: 
 2500: handle_call(started_p, _From, State) ->
 2501:     io:format("FROZ"),
 2502:     {reply,ok,State};
 2503: handle_call({delayed_answer, T}, From, State) ->
 2504:     {noreply,{reply_to,From,State},T};
 2505: handle_call({call_within, T}, _From, _) ->
 2506:     {reply,ok,call_within,T};
 2507: handle_call(next_call, _From, call_within) ->
 2508:     {reply,ok,[]};
 2509: handle_call(next_call, _From, State) ->
 2510:     {reply,false,State};
 2511: handle_call(badreturn, _From, _State) ->
 2512:     badreturn;
 2513: handle_call(hibernate, _From, _State) ->
 2514:     {reply,true,[],hibernate};
 2515: handle_call({hibernate_noreply,Pid}, From, _State) ->
 2516:     Pid ! go,
 2517:     {noreply,From,hibernate};
 2518: handle_call(stop, _From, State) ->
 2519:     {stop,stopped,ok,State};
 2520: handle_call(crash, _From, _State) ->
 2521:     exit(crashed);
 2522: handle_call(exit_shutdown, _From, _State) ->
 2523:     exit(shutdown);
 2524: handle_call(stop_shutdown, _From, State) ->
 2525:     {stop,shutdown,State};
 2526: handle_call(shutdown_reason, _From, _State) ->
 2527:     exit({shutdown,reason});
 2528: handle_call({call_undef_fun, Mod, Fun}, _From, State) ->
 2529:     Mod:Fun(),
 2530:     {reply, ok, State};
 2531: handle_call({continue_reply, Pid}, _From, State) ->
 2532:     self() ! {after_continue, Pid},
 2533:     {reply, ok, State, {continue, {message, Pid}}};
 2534: handle_call({continue_noreply, Pid}, From, State) ->
 2535:     self() ! {after_continue, Pid},
 2536:     {noreply, State, {continue, {message, Pid, From}}};
 2537: handle_call(stop_shutdown_reason, _From, State) ->
 2538:     {stop,{shutdown,stop_reason},State}.
 2539: 
 2540: handle_cast({From,handle_cast}, State) ->
 2541:     From ! {self(), handled_cast},
 2542:     {noreply, State};
 2543: handle_cast({From,delayed_cast,T}, _State) ->
 2544:     {noreply, {delayed_cast,From}, T};
 2545: handle_cast(hibernate_now, _State) ->
 2546:     {noreply, [], hibernate};
 2547: handle_cast(hibernate_later, _State) ->
 2548:     {ok, _} = timer:send_after(1000,self(),hibernate_now),
 2549:     {noreply, []};
 2550: handle_cast({call_undef_fun, Mod, Fun}, State) ->
 2551:     Mod:Fun(),
 2552:     {noreply, State};
 2553: handle_cast({continue_noreply, Pid}, State) ->
 2554:     self() ! {after_continue, Pid},
 2555:     {noreply, State, {continue, {message, Pid}}};
 2556: handle_cast({From, stop}, State) ->
 2557:     io:format("BAZ"),
 2558:     {stop, {From,stopped}, State}.
 2559: 
 2560: handle_info(timeout, {reply_to, From, State}) ->
 2561:     gen_server:reply(From, delayed),
 2562:     {noreply, State};
 2563: handle_info(timeout, hibernate_me) -> % Arrive here from 
 2564: 						% handle_info(hibernate_later,...)
 2565:     {noreply, [], hibernate};
 2566: handle_info(hibernate_now, _State) ->  % Arrive here from 
 2567: 						% handle_cast({_,hibernate_later},...)
 2568: 						% and by direct ! from testcase
 2569:     {noreply, [], hibernate};
 2570: handle_info(hibernate_later, _State) ->
 2571:     {noreply, hibernate_me, 1000};
 2572: handle_info(timeout, call_within) ->
 2573:     {noreply, []};
 2574: handle_info(timeout, {delayed_cast, From}) ->
 2575:     From ! {self(), delayed},
 2576:     {noreply, []};
 2577: handle_info(timeout, {delayed_info, From}) ->
 2578:     From ! {self(), delayed_info},
 2579:     {noreply, []};
 2580: handle_info({call_undef_fun, Mod, Fun}, State) ->
 2581:     Mod:Fun(),
 2582:     {noreply, State};
 2583: handle_info({From, handle_info}, _State) ->
 2584:     From ! {self(), handled_info},
 2585:     {noreply, []};
 2586: handle_info({From, delayed_info, T}, _State) ->
 2587:     {noreply, {delayed_info, From}, T};
 2588: handle_info(continue, From) ->
 2589:     gen_server:reply(From,true),
 2590:     {noreply, []};
 2591: handle_info({From, stop}, State) ->
 2592:     {stop, {From,stopped_info}, State};
 2593: handle_info({after_continue, Pid}, State) ->
 2594:     Pid ! {self(), after_continue},
 2595:     Pid ! {self(), ack},
 2596:     {noreply, State};
 2597: handle_info({continue_noreply, Pid}, State) ->
 2598:     self() ! {after_continue, Pid},
 2599:     {noreply, State, {continue, {message, Pid}}};
 2600: handle_info({continue_continue, Pid}, State) ->
 2601:     {noreply, State, {continue, {continue, Pid}}};
 2602: handle_info(continue_stop, State) ->
 2603:     {noreply, State, {continue, stop}};
 2604: handle_info(_Info, State) ->
 2605:     {noreply, State}.
 2606: 
 2607: handle_continue({continue, Pid}, State) ->
 2608:     Pid ! {self(), before_continue},
 2609:     self() ! {after_continue, Pid},
 2610:     {noreply, State, {continue, {message, Pid}}};
 2611: handle_continue(stop, State) ->
 2612:     {stop, normal, State};
 2613: handle_continue({message, Pid}, State) ->
 2614:     Pid ! {self(), continue},
 2615:     {noreply, State};
 2616: handle_continue({message, Pid, From}, State) ->
 2617:     Pid ! {self(), continue},
 2618:     gen_server:reply(From, ok),
 2619:     {noreply, State}.
 2620: 
 2621: code_change(_OldVsn,
 2622:             {new, {undef_in_code_change, {Mod, Fun}}} = State,
 2623:             _Extra) ->
 2624:     Mod:Fun(),
 2625:     {ok, State}.
 2626: 
 2627: terminate({From, stopped}, _State) ->
 2628:     io:format("FOOBAR"),
 2629:     From ! {self(), stopped},
 2630:     ok;
 2631: terminate({From, stopped_info}, _State) ->
 2632:     From ! {self(), stopped_info},
 2633:     ok;
 2634: terminate(_, crash_terminate) ->
 2635:     exit({crash, terminate});
 2636: terminate(_, {undef_in_terminate, {Mod, Fun}}) ->
 2637:     Mod:Fun(),
 2638:     ok;
 2639: terminate(_Reason, _State) ->
 2640:     ok.
 2641: 
 2642: format_status(_, [_PDict, Fun] = S) when is_function(Fun) ->
 2643:     Fun(S);
 2644: format_status(terminate, [_PDict, State]) ->
 2645:     {formatted, State};
 2646: format_status(normal, [_PDict, _State]) ->
 2647:     format_status_called.
